1.verse: Da Beginning - Aloha, my friend Teofilus, Plenny guys wen write down da tings dat wen happen wit us.

2.verse: Dey wen write down da stuff da odda guys wen see from da time Jesus wen start fo teach, an dey wen teach us an plenny odda peopo bout wat wen happen.

3.verse: An me, I wen check out real good all da stuff dat wen happen from da start, an I tink dat I like write um down fo you one by one.

4.verse: Den you can know dat da stuff you wen learn stay true.

5.verse: John Da Baptiza Goin Born - Wen Herod stay king fo Judea, had one priest guy name Zekariah. He wen work wit da Abijah priest hui. Elizabet, she his wife. She wen come from da Aaron priest ohana.

6.verse: Zekariah an his wife wen do da right tings da way God see um. Everyting da Boss wen tell um fo do, an all Godʼs Rules, dey wen do, an no mo nobody poin finga dem.

7.verse: Dey no mo kids cuz Elizabet no can. She an Zekariah stay old now.

8.verse: An wen happen dat wen Zekariah wen go in front God inside da temple, fo do da priest kine job wit his priest hui,

9.verse: da priest guys wen pick Zekariah fo go inside Godʼs Spesho Place an burn da incense dat time. Dey wen pick um Jun Ken A Po kine, cuz dass how dey wen do um.

10.verse: An all da peopo stand outside praying wen da time wen come wen he suppose to burn da incense.

11.verse: Den Zekariah wen spock one angel messenja guy from da Boss Up Dea In Da Sky dat wen come, standing on da right side by da altar wea da incense stay burn.

12.verse: Wen Zekariah see da angel guy he wen come mix up an scared.

13.verse: But da angel guy wen tell, “No scared, Zekariah! God wen hear wat you wen aks, an yoa wife Elizabet goin born one boy. You goin name him John.

14.verse: You goin stay real good inside cuz a him, an plenny peopo going stay good inside cuz he wen born.

15.verse: He goin be one importan guy, da way da Boss Up Dea In Da Sky see um. He no goin drink no wine o da odda kine booze. Godʼs Spesho Spirit goin take charge a him befo he born.

16.verse: He goin bring back plenny Israel peopo fo trus God dea Boss.

17.verse: He goin come first, befo da Boss come, wit da same kine spirit an power dat Elijah wen get. He goin make da faddas get love fo dea kids again. An da peopo dat no do wat dey suppose to do, he goin make dem tink right jalike da peopo dat do da right tings. He goin make da peopo ready fo wen da Boss Up Dea In Da Sky come.”

18.verse: Zekariah wen aks da angel guy, “How I goin know dis fo shua? I one old man, an my wife, she old too.”

19.verse: Da angel guy wen tell, “I Gabriel, da one dat stand in front God, an he wen send me fo tell you dis good stuff.

20.verse: From now on, you no can talk notting, till yoa boy born, cuz you neva trus wat I wen say. Dis goin happen fo shua at da right time.”

21.verse: All da time dis stay going on, da peopo stay wait fo Zekariah outside, an dey wen tink how come he wen stay long time inside da temple.

22.verse: Wen he come outside, he no can talk to dem. So dey wen tink he wen see someting spesho inside dea, cuz he wen make signs wit his hands, but no can talk.

23.verse: Wen da time pau fo his job, he wen go home.

24.verse: Afta dat his wife Elizabet wen come hapai, an fo five months she wen stay hide inside da house.

25.verse: She say, “Da Boss Up Dea In Da Sky wen do dis fo me. He wen show me he do someting good fo me, an he wen take away my shame wit da peopo.”

26.verse: Jesus Goin Born - Afta six months God wen send da angel messenja Gabriel to one town Galilee side name Nazaret.

27.verse: He come by one wahine name Mary. She neva come togedda wit one guy yet, but she make ready fo marry one guy name Joseph. He from King Davidʼs ohana.

28.verse: Da angel guy come by her an say, “Aloha! Da Good Boss Up Dea In Da Sky goin do someting spesho fo you. He stay wit you.”

29.verse: Mary come mix up cuz a wat he wen say, an tinking wat dat mean.

30.verse: Da angel guy say, “Mary, no scared. God wen pick you, cuz he like do plenny good stuff fo you.

31.verse: You goin come hapai, an goin born one boy. You goin name him ‘Jesus.’

32.verse: He goin be importan, An God goin call him ‘my Boy dat come from me, Da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods.’ God da Boss goin make him one king Jalike King David, his ancesta guy.

33.verse: He goin stay King fo Jacobʼs ohana, da Israel peopo, foeva. Dat no goin pau eva.”

34.verse: Mary aks him, “How dis can be? I neva even sleep wit one guy.”

35.verse: Da angel guy say, “Godʼs Spesho Spirit goin come ova you. Da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods, his power goin cover you. An dat baby you goin get, God goin call him ‘Spesho Fo Me’ an ‘Godʼs Boy’.

36.verse: You know Elizabet, yoa ohana? No matta she stay old, she goin born one boy too. Peopo say she no can born babies, but she six months hapai awready.

37.verse: Notting too hard fo God.”

38.verse: Mary say, “I da Boss helpa. Do um to me jalike you wen say.” Den da angel guy wen go way.

39.verse: Mary Go See Elizabet - Dat time, Mary wen get up an wen go fast to one town in da hills Judea side.

40.verse: Ova dea she wen go inside Zekariahʼs house, an wen spock Elizabet, an wen tell her, “Aloha!”

41.verse: Wen Elizabet wen hear Mary say dat, da baby wen huli inside her, an Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen take ova Elizabet.

42.verse: An she wen talk loud an say, “God stay do mo good fo you den fo all da wahines, an he stay do mo good fo da boy you goin born too!

43.verse: But why dis good ting happen to me, dat you wen come by me, an you goin be my Boss mudda?!

44.verse: Cuz wen I hear you say ‘Aloha,’ right den an dea da baby inside me wen huli cuz he stay good inside.

45.verse: Da Boss stay do plenny good stuff fo you, cuz you stay shua dat da ting he say, goin happen.

46.verse: Mary Sing One Song - Mary wen say, “My heart say good tings bout da Boss Up Dea Inside Da Sky,

47.verse: My spirit stay good inside Cuz God take me outa da bad kine stuff I stay in,

48.verse: Cuz he wen tink bout me, his poor worka! From now on all da peopo goin say God wen do plenny good stuffs fo me,

49.verse: Cuz God get power An wen do plenny importan tings fo me. He stay spesho an good, dass wat kine God him.

50.verse: He give da peopo chance dat show respeck fo him, From da granfaddas to da kids.

51.verse: He stay show his power An stay make da peopo wit big head so dey no can do All da stuff dey like do.

52.verse: He stay pull down plenny big kings from dea thrones, An he stay make da peopo dat no mo notting importan.

53.verse: He stay give da hungry peopo good stuff fo eat, An he stay send away da rich guys wit notting.

54.verse: He stay help da Israel peopo dat work fo him. He no foget fo give dem chance,

55.verse: Jalike he wen tell our ancesta guys, Abraham, an his ohana, foeva.”

56.verse: Mary wen stay dea wit Elizabet three months, an den she wen go home.

57.verse: John Da Baptiza Wen Born - Da time wen come fo Elizabet fo born her baby, an she wen born her boy.

58.verse: Da peopo from ova dea an her ohana wen hear how plenny da Boss wen do cuz he get pity fo her, an dey all wen come real good inside wit her.

59.verse: One week lata dey wen come fo cut da baby skin. Dey wen tink dey goin name him Zekariah jalike his fadda.

60.verse: But his mudda say, “No way! We goin name him ‘John.’ ”

61.verse: Dey tell her, “But you no mo nobody in yoa ohana wit dat name!”

62.verse: Den dey wen make signs wit dea hands to his fadda, an wen aks him wat he like name da boy.

63.verse: Zekariah wen aks fo one paper an wen write down, “He get da name ‘John.’ ” An dea jaws wen drop!

64.verse: Right den an dea Zekariah wen start fo talk an say good tings bout God.

65.verse: Da peopo from ova dea wen come scared. An everybody wen tell dis story all ova da place in da hills Judea side.

66.verse: Everybody dat wen hear dat story wen tink plenny, an say, “Wat kine kid dis goin be?” An Godʼs power stay wit him.

67.verse: Zekariah Sing One Song - Da time Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen take ova Johnʼs fadda Zekariah, he wen tell stuff from God, lidis:

68.verse: “Tell good tings bout da Boss Up Dea Inside Da Sky, Da God fo da Israel peopo! He wen come fo cut loose his peopo So dey no gotta be jalike slaves no moa.

69.verse: He give us one Guy dat get power Fo take us outa da bad kine stuff we stay in. Dat Guy come from King Davidʼs ohana, Da king dat wen work fo God.

70.verse: From befo time da spesho guys dat wen talk fo God Wen tell dis,

71.verse: He wen promise fo take us away from da guys dat stay agains us An from da power dey get.

72.verse: He wen say he goin give our ancesta guys chance, An he no goin foget da spesho deal he wen make.

73.verse: He wen promise our ancesta Abraham fo shua

74.verse: Dat he goin take us away from da guys dat stay agains us, An from da power dey get, He goin help us work fo him an no be scared,

75.verse: So we can come spesho an right da way he see us All da days we stay alive.

76.verse: An you, my boy John, dey goin call you One guy dat talk fo da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods, Cuz you goin go first, befo da Boss, Fo make da road ready fo him,

77.verse: Fo make da peopo know Dat he goin take dem outa da bad kine stuff dey stay doing, An he goin let um go an hemo dea shame from dat.

78.verse: Our God give chance cuz he get big heart. Dass why da new day goin come up fo us from God in da sky.

79.verse: So da peopo dat stay do bad kine stuff, Jalike dey stay live inside da dark an no can see notting, An dey goin mahke inside, God goin help dem fo know da trut. Den we goin see da right way An den our heart goin rest inside.”

80.verse: Da boy John wen grow up, an his spirit wen come strong. He wen live inside da boonies till da day wen he wen come out an da Israel peopo wen see him.

1.verse: Jesus Wen Born - Dat time, da king fo da Rome peopo, Augustus Cesar, wen make all da peopo sign up fo find out how much peopo get every place.

2.verse: Dis da first sign up dey wen make wen Quirinius stay governa fo Syria.

3.verse: Everybody wen go back to da town dea ohana come from fo sign up.

4.verse: So Joseph wen go from Nazaret town Galilee side, to Betlehem Judea side, King Davidʼs town, cuz he come from King Davidʼs ohana.

5.verse: He go ova dea fo sign up wit Mary, da wahine da ohana wen promise fo marry him. She stay hapai.

6.verse: Wen dey stay dea, da time come fo her fo born her baby.

7.verse: An she wen born her numba one boy, an wrap him up inside some cloths, an lay him down inside one ting fo hold da cows food, cuz no mo room fo dem inside da small hotel.

8.verse: Da Sheep Farmas An Da Angel Messenja Guys - Dat nite, ova dea inside da fields, get sheep farmas taking care dea sheeps.

9.verse: Right den an dea one angel messenja guy from da Boss Up Dea Inside Da Sky come by dem. All aroun dem one awesome light wen shine from da Boss. An dey wen come real scared.

10.verse: But da angel guy say, “No scared. I come fo tell you guys Good Stuff From God dat goin make you guys an all da peopo stay good inside.

11.verse: Dis day inside King Davidʼs town, one boy wen born dat goin take you guys outa da bad kine stuff you stay doing. He da Christ Guy, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send. He da Boss.

12.verse: Dis how you goin know him. You goin find one baby dat stay wrap up inside plenny cloths, lying down inside one ting fo hold da cows food.”

13.verse: Right den an dea uku paila angel guys from da sky wen show up wit da first angel guy. Dey saying good stuff bout God lidis:

14.verse: “Up inside da sky wea God stay, He stay awesome! An ova hea on top da earth, If God like wat peopo doing, He goin make dea heart rest inside.”

15.verse: Den da angel guys wen go way from dem an go back by God inside da sky. Da sheep farmas tell each odda, “Eh brahs, we go Betlehem fo see dis ting dat wen happen, dat da Boss Up Dea Inside Da Sky wen tell us.”

16.verse: So dey run an find Mary an Joseph, an da baby stay dea, lying down inside one ting fo hold da cows food.

17.verse: Wen dey see da baby, dey tell everybody wat da angel guys wen say bout dis boy.

18.verse: Everybody dat wen hear dat, stay tinking bout wat da sheep farmas wen tell dem.

19.verse: But Mary wen put all dese tings inside her heart, an tink plenny how spesho dey stay.

20.verse: Da sheep farmas wen go back, an dey tell everybody how God stay plenny good an awesome, cuz all da stuff dey wen hear an see, was jalike da angel guy wen tell dem.

21.verse: His Name Jesus - One week lata da time come fo cut skin. An dey give da baby da name Jesus, jalike da angel guy from God wen say befo Mary come hapai.

22.verse: Dey Bring Jesus Inside Godʼs Temple‘R’Da Sacrifice - Befo time, Moses wen write down inside Godʼs Rules, all da stuff dat peopo gotta do wen one baby born, cuz da mudda kapu fo forty days an no can go pray wit da odda peopo. But wen pau da kapu, da mudda an da fadda gotta make sacrifice, den she can go pray wit da odda peopo. So wen da time come, Joseph an Mary wen take Jesus to Jerusalem fo bring him inside da Temple, in front da Boss.

23.verse: Da Boss wen say inside his Rules dat Moses wen write down befo time, “Bring me every numba one boy fo make him spesho fo me.”

24.verse: An Joseph an Mary wen make one sacrifice cuz dea numba one boy wen born, jalike da Rules from da Boss wen say, “If dey no mo notting, den two doves o two pigeons fo da sacrifice.”

25.verse: Simeon - Dat time get one guy inside Jerusalem name Simeon. He one guy dat everytime do da right ting an pray. He stay waiting fo da One dat goin kokua da Israel peopo. An Godʼs Spesho Spirit stay in charge a him.

26.verse: Godʼs Spirit wen show him dat he no goin mahke befo he see da Christ guy, da Spesho Guy dat da Boss Up Dea In Da Sky goin send.

27.verse: Godʼs Spirit wen tell him an he wen go inside da temple yard. Wen da fadda an mudda wen bring da boy Jesus inside fo do wat da Rules say,

28.verse: Simeon take him inside his arms an say good stuff bout God lidis:

29.verse: “Boss, You wen do wat you wen promise To me, da guy dat work fo you. So now you can let me mahke. My heart goin rest inside

30.verse: Cuz I see wat you wen do Fo take us outa da bad kine stuff we stay in.

31.verse: You wen make dis Boy ready fo do all dat In front all da peopo.

32.verse: He jalike one light Fo make yoa peopo come awesome, Da Israel peopo, An fo show all da odda peopos Inside da world Wat stay right.”

33.verse: Da fadda an mudda wen tink plenny bout da stuff Simeon say bout da boy.

34.verse: Simeon aks God fo do good tings fo dem too. He tell Jesus mudda Mary, “God wen send dis boy, an plenny Israel peopo goin mess up cuz a him. But plenny odda Israel peopo, dey goin come okay cuz a him. He goin be jalike one sign dat tell peopo fo watch out. Plenny peopo no goin like dat, an dey goin talk agains him.

35.verse: Dat goin show wat plenny peopo tinking. An you too, Mary, you goin come sore inside, jalike one sword going thru yoa heart.”

36.verse: Anna - Had one old wahine dea dat talk fo God, name Anna. She Fanuelʼs girl, from da Asher ohana. She wen stay marry seven years,

37.verse: an now, she one widow fo eighty-four years. She no go outside da temple yard eva. Day time an nite time she doing stuff fo God, skipping food an praying.

38.verse: Dat time she wen come an tank God, an tell everybody bout da boy. She tell all da peopo dat stay waiting, cuz dey know God goin cut loose da Jerusalem peopo so dey no gotta be jalike slaves no moa.

39.verse: Dey Go Back To Nazaret - Wen Joseph an Mary wen do all da stuff dey gotta do, jalike da Boss Up Dea In Da Sky wen say inside da Rules, dey go back Galilee side, Nazaret town.

40.verse: Da boy grow an come strong. He come akamai, an God wen do good tings fo him.

41.verse: Da Boy Jesus Inside Da Temple - Every year Jesus fadda an mudda wen go Jerusalem fo da Passova.

42.verse: Wen Jesus make twelve, dey wen go da Passova jalike dey everytime go.

43.verse: Wen da days fo da Passova pau, dey wen start fo go home, but da boy Jesus wen stay inside Jerusalem. His fadda an mudda neva know he wen stay dea.

44.verse: Dey wen tink Jesus stay wit da odda peopo dat wen go wit dem. So dey wen go fo one day, an den dey wen start fo look fo him wit dea ohana an dea friends.

45.verse: Dey neva find him, so dey wen go back to Jerusalem fo look fo him.

46.verse: Day numba three, dey wen find Jesus inside da temple yard, sitting dea wit da Jewish teachas, listening to dem an aksing dem stuff.

47.verse: Everybody dat wen hear Jesus, wen blow dea minds, cuz dey can see he akamai da way he wen talk to dem.

48.verse: His fadda an mudda was all shook up wen dey spock him, an his mudda wen tell him, “My boy, why you do dis to us? Me an yoa fadda neva feel good inside, wen we was trying fo find you.”

49.verse: He wen tell, “Why you wen look fo me? You neva know I gotta do my Faddaʼs kuleana?”

50.verse: But dey neva undastan wat he wen tell dem.

51.verse: So Jesus wen go back wit dem to Nazaret, an everytime wen do wat dey say. But his mudda wen keep all dis stuff inside her heart an tink plenny bout um.

52.verse: An Jesus wen grow an come mo akamai an mo tall. An everybody wen tink good bout him, both God an da peopo.

1.verse: John Da Baptiza Teach Da Peopo - Afta da Big King Tiberius Cesar was king fo Rome fifteen years, Pontius Pilate da territorial governa from Rome fo Judea, Herod da small kine king inside Galilee, Herodʼs brudda Philip da small kine king inside Iturea an Trakonitis, Lysanias da small kine king inside Abilene,

2.verse: an Annas an Kaiafas da main priest guys fo da Jewish peopo; dat time da guy John, Zekariahʼs boy, he wen stay ova dea inside da boonies. Den God wen talk to him.

3.verse: So he wen go all ova da place aroun da Jordan River, an tell da peopo, “You guys, you gotta come sorry an pau do all da bad kine stuff you stay doing now, an no do um no moa, an get baptize. Den God goin let all you guys go an hemo yoa shame fo all da bad kine stuff you doing.”

4.verse: Dass jalike Isaiah wen tell. He one guy who wen talk fo God befo time. He wen write down dis inside da Bible: “One guy goin talk real loud inside da boonies, ‘Eh! Make da road ready fo da Boss! Make um strait fo him!’

5.verse: Every valley, dey goin fill um up, Every mountain an hill, dey goin make um flat. Da crooked roads, dey goin make um strait, An da rough kine place, dey goin make um nice.

6.verse: An all da peopo inside da whole world Goin see dat God goin take us Outa da bad kine stuff we stay in.”

7.verse: Plenny peopo wen go ova dea so John can baptize um. He wen tell, “Eh! You guys no good, jalike one snake ohana! Who wen tell you guys fo run away from da bad tings dat goin happen? Cuz God no goin take all da bad kine stuff you do. He goin punish you guys fo dat!

8.verse: Jalike one fruit tree give same kine fruit, you guys gotta do da kine good stuff dat show dat you pau do all da kine bad stuff you doing, an no do um no moa. Eh! No start fo tell yoaself, ‘Us guys can do wat we like, cuz we get Abraham fo our main fadda.’ I telling you guys now, God can take dese rocks ova hea an make kids fo Abraham outa dem.

9.verse: You guys gotta do good kine stuff! Cuz jalike awready get one guy wit one ax, all ready fo cut da tree roots. All da trees dat no make good fruit, he goin cut um down, an throw um inside da fire.”

10.verse: Da peopo wen say, “Den wat we gotta do?”

11.verse: John tell, “Da guy dat get two coats gotta give one to da guy dat no mo coat. An da guy dat get food gotta give to da guy dat no mo food.”

12.verse: Some guys dat collect money fo tax fo da govermen wen come so John can baptize dem too. An dey aks him, “Teacha, wat we gotta do?”

13.verse: He wen tell um, “No take mo money den you suppose to.”

14.verse: Some army guys wen aks him, “An wat we gotta do?” He wen tell, “No push nobody fo give you guys money, an no blame nobody fo someting dey neva do. Stay good inside wit da kine pay you get.”

15.verse: Da peopo stay waiting fo da Spesho Guy God Goin Send, an dey wen tink plenny inside dea hearts if John dat guy.

16.verse: John wen tell, “I baptizing you guys wit water. Dat goin show dat you stay sorry fo all da kine bad stuff you do. But afta me, goin come one nodda guy, da Christ guy. He way mo importan den me. An you know wat? I not big nuff fo help him hemo his slippas from his feets. Da way he goin baptize you guys, jalike he goin give you Godʼs Spirit fo take ova you, jalike he goin baptize you guys wit fire.

17.verse: Dat mean, da Christ guy goin punish da peopo dat stay do bad kine stuff. Jalike one farma guy put da wheat grain inside da basket an let da wind blow out all da junk kine stuff from da grain, den he put da wheat inside da storage place. Afta dat, he burn da junk kine stuff. Dat mean, da Christ guy goin punish da peopo dat stay do bad kine stuff, jalike he throw um inside da fire dat no goin pio eva.”

18.verse: John wen tell da peopo plenny mo stuff so dey can trus da Good Stuff From God he stay telling dem.

19.verse: But John wen scold Herod da small kine king ova dea, cuz Herod wen steal his own bruddaʼs wife Herodias, an marry her. He wen do plenny mo bad kine stuff too.

20.verse: An one ting mo worse, bumbye Herod goin throw John inside da prison.

21.verse: John Baptize Jesus - Had one time, John wen baptize all da peopo, an he baptize Jesus too. Afta John baptize Jesus an Jesus stay praying, da sky wen open

22.verse: an Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen come down on top Jesus. Can see da Spirit dat time, look jalike one dove. An wow! Had one voice from da sky wen say, “You my Boy. I really get love an aloha fo you, an I stay good inside cuz a you.”

23.verse: Jesus Ohana - Wen Jesus wen start fo teach, he was bout thirty years old. Da peopo wen tink he Josephʼs boy. Joseph, he Heliʼs boy;

24.verse: Heli, he Mattatʼs boy; Mattat, he Leviʼs boy; Levi, he Melkiʼs boy; Melki, he Jannaiʼs boy; Jannai, he Josephʼs boy;

25.verse: Joseph, he Mattatias boy; Mattatias, he Amos boy; Amos, he Nahumʼs boy; Nahum, he Esliʼs boy; Esli, he Naggaiʼs boy;

26.verse: Naggai, he Maatʼs boy; Maat, he Mattatiasʼ boy; Mattatias, he Semeinʼs boy; Semein, he Josekʼs boy; Josek, he Jodaʼs boy;

27.verse: Joda, he Joananʼs boy; Joanan, he Resaʼs boy; Resa, he Zerubbabelʼs boy; Zerubbabel, he Shealtielʼs boy; Shealtiel, he Neriʼs boy;

28.verse: Neri, he Melkiʼs boy; Melki, he Addiʼs boy; Addi, he Cosamʼs boy; Cosam, he Elmadamʼs boy; Elmadam, he Erʼs boy;

29.verse: Er, he Joshuaʼs boy; Joshua, he Eliezerʼs boy; Eliezer, he Jorimʼs boy; Jorim, he Mattatʼs boy; Mattat, he Leviʼs boy;

30.verse: Levi, he Simeonʼs boy; Simeon, he Judahʼs boy; Judah, he Josephʼs boy; Joseph, he Jonamʼs boy; Jonam, he Eliakimʼs boy;

31.verse: Eliakim, he Meleaʼs boy; Melea, he Mennaʼs boy; Menna, he Mattataʼs boy; Mattata, he Nathanʼs boy; Nathan, he Davidʼs boy;

32.verse: David, he Jesseʼs boy; Jesse, he Obedʼs boy; Obed, he Boaz boy; Boaz, he Salmonʼs boy; Salmon, he Nashonʼs boy;

33.verse: Nashon, he Aminadabʼs boy; Aminadab, he Adminʼs boy; Admin, he Arniʼs boy; Arni, he Hezronʼs boy; Hezron, he Perezʼ boy; Perez, he Judahʼs boy;

34.verse: Judah, he Jacobʼs boy; Jacob, he Isaacʼs boy; Isaac, he Abrahamʼs boy; Abraham, he Terahʼs boy; Terah, he Nahorʼs boy;

35.verse: Nahor, he Serugʼs boy; Serug, he Reuʼs boy; Reu, he Pelegʼs boy; Peleg, he Eberʼs boy; Eber, he Shelahʼs boy;

36.verse: Shelah, he Cainanʼs boy; Cainan, he Arfaxadʼs boy; Arfaxad, he Shemʼs boy; Shem, he Noahʼs boy; Noah, he Lamekʼs boy;

37.verse: Lamek, he Metuselahʼs boy; Metuselah, he Enokʼs boy; Enok, he Jaredʼs boy; Jared, he Mahalaleelʼs boy; Mahalaleel, he Cainanʼs boy;

38.verse: Cainan, he Enos boy; Enos, he Sethʼs boy; Seth, he Adamʼs boy; Adam, he Godʼs boy.

1.verse: Da Devil Try Make Jesus Do Bad Kine Stuff - Afta John wen baptize Jesus, Jesus wen go way from da Jordan River. Godʼs Spesho Spirit stay in charge a him, an Godʼs Spirit wen take him to da boonies.

2.verse: Fo forty days da Devil wen try presha Jesus fo do bad kine stuff. Jesus neva eat notting dat time, an afta dat he hungry.

3.verse: Da Devil tell him, “So, wat? You Godʼs Boy fo real kine? Den tell dis rock fo come bread.”

4.verse: Jesus wen say, “Da Bible say, ‘No mo nobody dat can live ony on bread.’ ”

5.verse: Den da Devil take him up on top one high place, an show him all da diffren countries all ova da world in one second.

6.verse: An da Devil tell him, “All dis power an awesome stuff, dass mines, an I can give um to anybody I like.

7.verse: I give you all dis, if you go down on yoa knees an give me plenny respeck.”

8.verse: Jesus tell him, “Da Bible say, ‘Gotta go down on yoa knees An give plenny respeck to God yoa Boss, An live an work ony fo him.’ ”

9.verse: Den da Devil take Jesus to Jerusalem an make him stand on top da high part a da tower on top da temple. Da Devil say, “So, wat? You Godʼs Boy fo real kine? Kay den, go jump down dea.

10.verse: Cuz da Bible say, ‘God goin tell his angel messenja guys Fo take care you real good.

11.verse: Dey goin bring you down wit dea hands, So yoa feet no hit da rocks.’ ”

12.verse: But Jesus tell him, “Da Bible say, ‘God, he yoa Boss. So no try presha him fo make him prove dat he God.’ ”

13.verse: Wen da Devil was pau trying fo make him do all kine bad stuff, he go way from him till nex time.

14.verse: Jesus Start fo Teach Galilee Side - Den Jesus wen go back Galilee side, wit plenny power from Godʼs Spesho Spirit. All da peopo ova dea in dat place wen hear all da stuff he wen do.

15.verse: He wen teach inside da Jewish churches, an everybody wen talk good bout him.

16.verse: Da Nazaret Peopo, Dey No Mo Respeck Fo Jesus - Jesus go Nazaret town, wea he wen grow up small kid time. Wen da Rest Day wen come, he go inside da Jewish church, jalike he every time go. He wen stand up fo read da Bible.

17.verse: Da helpa guy wen give him da book from Isaiah, da guy dat wen talk fo God befo time. He open um an find da place wea Isaiah wen write,

18.verse: “Da Spesho Spirit from da Boss stay in charge a me, Dass why he wen send me fo teach da peopo dat no mo notting Da Good Kine Stuff From God. He wen send me fo tell da prisona guys Dey can go free now. An tell da peopo dat no can see, Dey goin can see now, An tell da peopo dat da odda guys make any kine to dem, Dey no goin suffa no moa,

19.verse: He wen send me fo tell peopo da time wen da Boss Up Dea In Da Sky Goin do spesho tings fo dem.”

20.verse: Jesus wen close da book, an give um back to da helpa guy, an sit down. All da peopo inside da Jewish church wen look at him.

21.verse: He say, “Wat you guys jus wen hear from da Bible, stay coming true right now.”

22.verse: Everybody dat wen hear him wen talk good bout him. Wen blow dea minds cuz he talk good. Dey say, “Eh, dis Josephʼs boy, yeah?”

23.verse: Jesus say, “Fo shua you goin tell me wat our ancesta guys wen say, ‘Eh Docta! Make yoaself come good! Do da same ting ova hea in yoa own home town, jalike we hear you wen do inside Capernaum.’

24.verse: Dass how you guys stay! But I telling you, ‘One guy dat talk fo God, he no mo no respeck inside his own town.’

25.verse: Tink! Dass true dat befo time, wen Elijah stay alive, had plenny widows inside Israel an neva had rain from da sky fo three an one half years, an neva had food all ova da land.

26.verse: But God neva send Elijah fo help one widow inside Israel dat time. He wen send um fo help one widow inside Zarefat town, Sidon side.

27.verse: Same ting, wen Elisha was da talka fo God, had plenny lepa guys inside Israel. But God neva make one lepa guy inside Israel come good, dat time. Ony Naaman, da foreigna guy from Syria, God wen make him come good.”

28.verse: All da peopo inside da Jewish church wen come real huhu wen dey wen hear him talk good bout da foreigna guys.

29.verse: Dey wen stand up, drag him outside da town, an take him on top da hill wea da town stay, fo throw him ova da cliff.

30.verse: But he wen walk right thru all da peopo an go way from dea.

31.verse: Jesus Make One Bad Kine Spirit Let Go One Guy - Den Jesus go Capernaum town, Galilee side. He wen teach da peopo on da Jewish Rest Day.

32.verse: Wen blow dea minds, fo wat he teach um. Cuz he teach wit plenny power.

33.verse: Had one guy inside da Jewish church wit one bad kine spirit dat wen take ova him. He wen yell,

34.verse: “Whoa! You Jesus from Nazaret! Wat you like do to us spirits? Why you wen come ova hea? Fo kill us? I know who you! You da Good an Spesho Guy from God!”

35.verse: Jesus wen scold him. “Shut yoa mout! Let da guy go!” Den da bad kine spirit wen shake up da guy plenny in front dem, an wen let da guy go, an neva hurt him.

36.verse: Da peopo, wen blow dea minds. Dey tell each odda, “Eh! Wat dis? Wat kine new teaching dis? He get power fo even tell da bad kine spirits fo let go da peopo, an dey let um go!”

37.verse: An da peopo wen go all ova da place aroun dea fo tell everybody bout Jesus.

38.verse: Jesus Make Plenny Peopo Come Good - Jesus wen go outside da Jewish church, an go inside Simonʼs house. Simonʼs mudda-in-law had high feva. Simon dem aks Jesus fo help her.

39.verse: Den Jesus go stand by her bed, an tell da feva fo get out. Da feva wen pau. Right den an dea she wen get up, an give dem food.

40.verse: Wen da sun wen go down an da Rest Day pau, plenny peopo wen bring by Jesus odda peopo dat get all kine sick. He wen put his hands on top everybody dass sick, an wen make all a dem come good.

41.verse: An da bad kine spirits wen let go plenny peopo. Da spirits wen yell, “You Godʼs Boy!” Jesus wen scold da spirits, an neva let dem say notting, cuz dey wen know he da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.

42.verse: Jesus Teach Inside Da Jewish Churches - In da morning wen starting fo get light, Jesus go one place wea neva have nobody. Da peopo wen go look fo him, an wen dey find him, dey wen try fo make him stay wit dem.

43.verse: But he say, “I gotta go da odda towns too, fo teach da peopo da Good Stuff bout how dey can get God fo dea King, cuz dass why he wen send me.”

44.verse: So he wen teach inside all da Jewish churches all ova Judea side.

1.verse: Jesus Tell Some Guys, “Come Wit Me!” - One time Jesus was by Gennesaret Lake (dass Galilee Lake, you know), an all da peopo wen try come close by him fo hear wat God say.

2.verse: He spock two boats ova dea near da water. Da fisha guys wen leave um dea. Dey stay washing dea nets.

3.verse: Jesus go inside Simonʼs boat, an tell him fo go out litto bit from da beach. Den Jesus sit down an teach da peopo from dea.

4.verse: Wen he pau teach, he tell Simon, “Eh Simon, go out wea stay deep, an drop yoa nets.”

5.verse: Simon tell, “Boss, we wen work hard all nite, an ony whitewash. But cuz you wen say um, I goin do um.”

6.verse: So dey drop da nets, an dey catch uku paila fish, an da net wen start fo broke.

7.verse: Dey wen make signs fo dea bruddas inside da odda boat fo help um. Dem guys wen come an dey wen fill up da two boats so full, da boats wen start fo sink.

8.verse: Wen Simon Peter see how plenny fish dey get, he wen go down on his knees in front Jesus an say, “Eh, Boss, go way from me, cuz I one guy dat stay do bad kine stuff!”

9.verse: Simon an all da guys ova dea by him, wen blow dea minds, cuz dey wen catch so plenny fish.

10.verse: James an John, Zebedeeʼs boys dat work togedda wit Simon fishing, an wen blow dea minds too. Jesus tell Simon, “No scared. Da way you guys bring in da fish, I goin teach you guys how fo bring in peopo fo be my guys too!”

11.verse: Right den an dea, dey pull dea boats up on top da beach, an leave all dea stuffs, an go wit Jesus.

12.verse: Jesus Make One Lepa Guy Come Good - Wen Jesus stay inside one town, one lepa guy wen come dea. Da guy get da kine sores all ova. Wen he spock Jesus, he go down, an his face wen touch da groun, an he beg him, “Boss, if you like, you can make me come good, yeah?”

13.verse: Jesus wen stick out his hand an touch da guy. Same time Jesus say, “Okay, I can do dat. Come good.” Right den an dea da guy wen come good.

14.verse: Den Jesus wen tell him, “Make shua dat you no tell nobody bout dis. Go, let da priest guy check you out. No foget make da kine sacrifice now, jalike Moses wen tell inside Godʼs Rules. Gotta do all dat, so everybody goin know dat you stay good now.”

15.verse: But everybody all ova da place wen hear da stuff Jesus wen do, an plenny peopo wen come fo hear him, so he can make dem come good from all dea sick.

16.verse: Plenny times Jesus wen go wea neva have nobody, fo pray ova dea.

17.verse: Jesus An Da Guy Dat No Can Move - One time Jesus stay teaching. Had Pharisee guys an teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules sitting ova dea. Dey wen come from every town inside Galilee an Judea, an from Jerusalem. Jesus wen get power from da Boss Up Dea In Da Sky fo make da sick peopo come good.

18.verse: Had some guys dat wen bring one guy on top one mat. Da guy, he no can move, notting. Dey wen try bring him inside da house fo put him in front Jesus.

19.verse: But dey no can find one way fo do um, cuz da place stay jamming. So dey go on top da flat roof, an make one puka, an wen let um down on top da mat in front Jesus.

20.verse: Jesus wen see dat, an he tink, “Eh, wow! Dis guys trus me fo real kine, dat I goin make dea friend come good!” Den he tell da guy, “Eh you, you know all da bad kine stuff you wen do? I tell you now, da shame from all dat, pau awready!”

21.verse: Da Pharisee guys an da teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules, dey tinking, “Eh, dis guy ack an talk jalike he God! Ony God can let peopo go fo da bad kine stuff dey do an hemo dea shame!”

22.verse: But Jesus wen know wat dey tinking. He say, “How come you guys tinking bad kine stuff lidat?

23.verse: I like show proof you guys, dat I da Guy Dass fo Real, an I get da right inside dis world, fo let peopo go an hemo dea shame fo da bad kine stuff dey wen do. But, easy fo talk bout hemo da shame -- anybody can talk dat kine. But not easy fo do um. Same ting, easy fo tell one sick guy dat no can move, ‘Eh, stand up an move aroun!’ -- anybody can talk dat kine. But not easy fo do um. But now, I goin show proof you guys -- I goin make dis sick guy come strong.” An he tell da guy dat no can move, “Eh, get up! Take yoa mat, an go home awready!”

24.verse: I like show proof you guys, dat I da Guy Dass fo Real, an I get da right inside dis world, fo let peopo go an hemo dea shame fo da bad kine stuff dey wen do. But, easy fo talk bout hemo da shame -- anybody can talk dat kine. But not easy fo do um. Same ting, easy fo tell one sick guy dat no can move, ‘Eh, stand up an move aroun!’ -- anybody can talk dat kine. But not easy fo do um. But now, I goin show proof you guys -- I goin make dis sick guy come strong.” An he tell da guy dat no can move, “Eh, get up! Take yoa mat, an go home awready!”

25.verse: Right den an dea da guy wen get up in front all dem guys, take da mat, an go home, talking shaka stuff bout God.

26.verse: All da peopo wen see dat, an wen blow dea minds. Dey wen talk shaka stuff bout God too. Same time, dey wen come real scared. Dey say, “Dis awesome! We wen see unreal stuff today!”

27.verse: Jesus Tell Levi, “Come Be My Guy!” - Afta dat Jesus go outside an spock one guy dat collect money fo tax fo da govermen, sitting down inside his place. His name Levi. Jesus tell him, “Eh, come wit me, an be my guy!”

28.verse: So Levi wen get up, leave all his stuffs ova dea, an go wit Jesus.

29.verse: Den Levi make one big lu‛au fo Jesus inside his house. An plenny guys dat collect money fo tax an odda guys wen eat wit dem.

30.verse: But da Pharisee guys an da teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules an stick wit da Pharisee guys, dey wen grumble at Jesus guys. Dey say, “Eh, how come you guys eating wit da guys dat collect money fo tax an odda guys dat get bad name?”

31.verse: Jesus wen tell, “Da peopo dat not sick, dey no need docta, ony da sick peopo need docta.

32.verse: I neva come fo tell da good peopo fo come by me, but da peopo dat get bad name, so dey can come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an no do um no moa.”

33.verse: How Come Jesus Guys No Skip Food So Dey Can Pray? - Den da Pharisee guys an dea friends wen say, “Plenny times, da guys dat John Da Baptiza guy teach, dey no eat so dey can pray. An da guys dat da Pharisee guys teach, dey no eat so dey can pray. But da guys you teaching, dey stay eating an drinking. How come, aah?”

34.verse: Jesus wen tell, “Wat you tink? You can make da guys at one wedding skip food wen dea friend dat getting married stay dea wit dem? No can!

35.verse: But you know, bumbye da time goin come wen peopo goin take away dea friend. Den his friends goin feel bad, an den dey goin skip food.”

36.verse: He tell um anodda ting fo teach um. “Fo cover one puka on one old clothes, you no goin cut one piece from one new clothes, fo put on top da old clothes. You do dat, you goin mess up da new clothes, an da new piece no goin match da old clothes.

37.verse: An you no goin put grape juice fo make wine inside one old wineskin. You do dat, wen da grape juice come wine, goin bus da old wineskin. You goin lose da wine, an da skin too. Everyting poho!

38.verse: Mo betta, you put new wine inside new wineskin.

39.verse: Nobody like drink da new kine wine afta he wen drink da old, cuz he say, ‘Da old wine mo betta.’ ”

1.verse: Dey Give Jesus Hard Time Bout Da Rest Day - One time, was da Jewish Rest Day. Jesus an his guys wen walk thru da fields wea dey grow da wheat. His guys wen pick litto bit wheat, rub um wit dea hands fo get rid a da junks, an eat um.

2.verse: But had some Pharisee guys wen say, “Hala! How come you guys doing da kine work you not suppose to do on da Rest Day?!”

3.verse: Jesus tell um, “Wot! You guys neva read inside da Bible wat David wen do, dat time him an his guys was hungry?

4.verse: He wen go inside Godʼs house. He take da bread dass spesho fo God dat stay ova dea, an eat um, an give um to his guys too. An nobody eva say notting, no matta Godʼs Rules say, ony da priest guys can eat dat bread.

5.verse: “Eh! I da Guy Dass Fo Real. Dass why I da One dat get da right fo say wat can do da Rest Day.”

6.verse: Jesus Make One Guy Come Good On Da Rest Day - One nodda Rest Day Jesus wen go inside one Jewish church an teach. One guy stay dea an his right hand stay funny kine.

7.verse: Some teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules an some Pharisee guys wen like bus Jesus, so dey watch um real good, if he goin make somebody come good on da Rest Day.

8.verse: But Jesus wen know wat dey tinking, an he wen tell da guy wit da funny kine hand, “Get up an stand up ova hea in front everybody.” An da guy come.

9.verse: Den Jesus wen tell dem, “I like aks you guys one question. Dass right in Godʼs Rules fo do da good kine stuff on da Rest Day, o da bad kine? Fo help peopo fo stay alive, o fo wipe um out?”

10.verse: He wen look aroun at dem, an den he tell da guy, “Stick out yoa hand.” An da guy stick um out, an his hand wen come good again.

11.verse: But da Pharisee guys wen come real huhu, an wen start fo make plan togedda wat dey like do to Jesus.

12.verse: Jesus Pick Twelve Guys - Dat time Jesus wen go up one hill fo pray. He stay dea an pray all nite.

13.verse: Wen day time come he call all dem dat go wit him fo come. An he wen pick twelve guys, an say dey da guys he goin send all ova.

14.verse: He pick Simon (da guy he wen name Peter), Andrew his brudda, James an John, Philip an Bartolomew,

15.verse: Matthew an Thomas, Alfeusʼs boy James, Simon da guy dey call da Jewish Sovereignty guy,

16.verse: Jamesʼ boy Judas, Judas Iscariot, da guy dat bumbye goin set Jesus up fo mahke.

17.verse: Jesus Teach An Make Peopo Come Good - Jesus wen come down da hill wit his guys, an he stand on top one flat place. Had plenny guys dea dat wen go wit him an plenny odda peopo from Jerusalem an all ova Judea, an from Tyre an Sidon, two towns dat stay near da ocean.

18.verse: Dey wen come ova dea fo listen to him, an so he can make um come good from all kine sick. Da kine wit da bad kine spirits dat bodda dem, Jesus wen make um all come good.

19.verse: Everybody wen try fo touch him, cuz da power was coming outa him an make um all come good.

20.verse: Da Peopo Dat Stay Good Inside An Da Peopo Dat Stay Sad - Jesus wen look da guys he teaching an say, “You guys dat no mo notting now, You can stay good inside Cuz God, he yoa King!

21.verse: “You guys dat stay hungry now, You can stay good inside Cuz you goin come full! “You guys dat cry now, You can stay good inside Cuz you goin laugh!

22.verse: “You guys can stay good inside wen da peopo hate you, an throw you out, an talk bad to you, an say you no good cuz a me, da Guy Dass Fo Real!

23.verse: Da peopo dat hate you guys now, long time ago God wen send his talka guys fo teach dea ancesta guys, an dose peopo dat time wen make Godʼs talka guys suffa plenny too, jalike nowdays dea kids stay make you guys suffa. But eh! Go dance an sing wen dey make any kine to you guys, an stay plenny good inside! Cuz bumbye God goin have plenny good kine stuff in da sky fo you guys.

24.verse: “Auwe you guys dat stay rich now! You get da easy time awready.

25.verse: Auwe you guys dat stay full now! You goin come hungry! Auwe you guys dat laugh now! You goin come real sad an cry!

26.verse: “Auwe wen everybody talk good bout you guys! Cuz you know, dea ancesta guys wen talk good bout da fake guys long time ago dat wen say dey talk fo God but dey neva.”

27.verse: Get Love an Aloha fo da Peopo Dat Stay Agains You - “I telling you guys dat hear me, get love an aloha fo da peopo dat stay agains you. Do good stuff fo dem.

28.verse: Aks God fo do good tings to da peopo dat put kahuna on top you, an pray fo da peopo dat make you guys suffa.

29.verse: If one guy hit yoa right cheek, let him hit yoa left cheek too. If one guy steal yoa coat, give him yoa shirt too.

30.verse: Give to everybody who aks you fo someting, an if one guy rip off yoa stuffs, no tell him fo give um back.

31.verse: Do to da odda guy jalike you like him do to you.

32.verse: “If you guys ony get love an aloha fo da peopo dat get love an aloha fo you, you tink God owe you money fo dat? No way! Even da bad kine guys get love an aloha fo da guys dat get love an aloha fo dem!

33.verse: An if you guys ony do good to da peopo dat do good to you, you tink God owe you money fo dat? No way! Even da peopo dat do bad kine stuff do dat.

34.verse: If you guys ony lend someting to da peopo you tink goin give um back, you tink God owe you money fo dat? Even da bad kine peopo lend stuff to da bad kine peopo, if dey tink dey goin get um all back.

35.verse: No way! Get love an aloha fo da peopo dat stay agains you, an do um good, an lend um stuff, an no tink if you goin get um back! Cuz da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods, he everytime do good to da peopo dat no tank him an da peopo dat do real bad kine stuff. If you make like God, dat show dat he you guys Fadda, an you his kids. An bumbye, God goin have plenny good kine stuff bumbye in da sky fo you guys cuz a dat.

36.verse: Give chance jalike yoa Fadda give chance.

37.verse: No Make Like One Judge To da Odda Guy - “No make like one judge to nobody, an God no goin be yoa judge. No say da odda guy gotta be punish, an God no goin punish you. Let da odda guy go, an no stay huhu wit him. Den God goin let you go an hemo yoa shame fo all da bad kine stuff you wen do.

38.verse: Give to da odda guy, an God goin give to you. He goin fill um up, shake um, fill um up some moa, plenny goin even run ova, an he goin pour um all inside yoa bag. Cuz da way you give, same way he goin give to you.”

39.verse: Jesus talk some moa. He say, “You tink one blind guy can lead anodda blind guy? He do dat, an dey both goin fall down inside one puka.

40.verse: One guy not mo importan den his teacha, but everybody dat learn all da stuffs from dea teacha, dey goin come jalike dea teacha.

41.verse: “How come you guys spock da small piece junk inside yoa bruddaʼs eye, an no tink bout da big two by four inside yoa own eye?

42.verse: How you goin tell yoa brudda, ‘Eh, try let me pull da small piece junk outa yoa eye,’ wen you no see da big two by four inside yoa own eye? You say one ting an do anodda! First take da big two by four outa yoa own eye, den you can see good fo take da small piece junk outa yoa bruddaʼs eye.

43.verse: Da Tree An Da Fruit - “Da good kine tree no can give bad fruit, an da bad kine tree no can give good fruit.

44.verse: You know da kine tree from da kine fruit dey give. No can pick da fig o da grape from da kine tree wit kuku.

45.verse: Da good guy do good kine stuff from da good stuff inside his heart, an da bad guy do bad kine stuff from da bad stuff inside his heart. Da kine stuff inside da heart goin come out thru da mout by wat da guy say.

46.verse: Da Two House Builda Guys - “How come you guys call me ‘Boss, boss,’ but you no do wat I say?

47.verse: I goin show you guys how da guy stay dat come by me, an hear wat I say, an do um.

48.verse: He jalike da guy dat stay build his house, an dig deep an put da foundation on top da rock. Den da big water come, an pound da house, but no can shake um, cuz he wen make um good.

49.verse: But da guy dat hear wat I say an no do um, he jalike da guy dat build his house on top da groun, but no mo foundation. Da big water pound um, an dat house fall down an bus up.”

1.verse: Jesus Make One Captainʼs Worka Guy Come Good - Wen Jesus pau teach da peopo all dat stuff, he go Capernaum town.

2.verse: One captain fo da Rome army guys ova dea get one sick worka guy he get plenny love an aloha fo, an da guy stay dying.

3.verse: Da captain wen hear bout Jesus, an he send some older Jewish leadas by him, fo aks him fo come an make his worka guy come good.

4.verse: Wen dey come, dey beg him real hard. Dey say, “Dis captain, he one good guy. So dass good if you can help him.

5.verse: He get love an aloha fo our Jewish peopo, an he wen build our church fo us.”

6.verse: So Jesus wen go wit dem. Wen he come near da house, da captain send his friends fo tell him, “Boss, no bodda yoaself, cuz I not good nuff fo you fo come inside my house.

7.verse: Dass why I wen tink I not good nuff fo come by you. Jus say da word, an my worka guy goin come good.

8.verse: You know, I get one army boss who tell me wat fo do. An I tell my army guys wat fo do. I tell one guy, ‘Go,’ an he go. An I tell anodda guy, ‘Come,’ an he come. An I tell my worka guy ‘Do dis,’ an he do um.”

9.verse: Wen Jesus hear dat, his jaws wen drop, an he wen tell all da peopo dat stay dea, “Ho! Dis guy get um! No mo Israel peopo dat trus me lidat!”

10.verse: Den da guys da captain wen send wen go back to da house, an wen see dat da worka guy wen come good.

11.verse: Jesus Make One Widowʼs Boy Come Alive Again - Da nex day Jesus wen go Nain town. His guys an plenny odda peopo wen go wit him.

12.verse: Wen Jesus come to da town gate, da peopo from da town wen carry one open box wit one mahke guy thru da gate. His mudda one widow, an he was her ony boy. Plenny peopo from da town wen go wit her.

13.verse: Da Boss wen spock her, an he get pity fo her, an he say, “No cry now.”

14.verse: Den Jesus wen go an touch da open box wit da guy inside, an da guys dat stay carry um wen stand dea. He say, “Eh, brah, I telling you, get up!”

15.verse: Da mahke guy wen sit up, an start fo talk, an Jesus wen give him back to his mudda.

16.verse: Everybody wen come real scared, an dey wen talk good bout God lidis, “One importan guy dat talk fo God wen come by us! God wen come fo take care his peopo!”

17.verse: An dey wen tell all dis stuff bout Jesus all ova Judea an all da place aroun dea.

18.verse: Da Guys John Da Baptiza Send - Da guys dat John stay teaching wen tell John all dis stuff. He wen tell two a his guys fo come by him,

19.verse: an tell um fo go by da Boss Jesus an aks him, “Eh, you da guy suppose to come, o wat? O we suppose to wait fo one nodda guy fo come?”

20.verse: Wen dey come by Jesus dey say, “John Da Baptiza Guy wen send us by you fo aks, ‘Eh, you da guy suppose to come, o we suppose to wait fo one nodda guy fo come?’ ”

21.verse: Now, dat time Jesus stay make plenny guys come good from all kine sick, an wen make da bad kine spirits let go plenny peopo, an wen make plenny blind guys see.

22.verse: So he tell um, “Go, tell John wat you guys stay hear an see. Had guys dat no can see, now dey can see. Had guys dat no can walk, now dey can walk. Had lepa guys, now dey no mo sick. Had guys dat no can hear, now dey can hear. Had guys dat wen mahke, now dey alive. Da peopo dat no mo notting, now dey hear all da Good Kine Stuff From God dat I teaching dem.

23.verse: An if da tings I do no bodda you, den you goin stay good inside too.”

24.verse: Afta Johnʼs messenja guys wen go way, Jesus tell all da peopo bout John. “Wat you guys wen go in da boonies fo see? Da wind shaking one bamboo?

25.verse: Nah! Kay den, wat you guys wen go ova dea fo see? One guy wit fancy kine clothes? You know wat? Da guys dat wear awesome kine clotheses an get all kine rich stuffs, dey stay inside da kingʼs palace.

26.verse: If not dat, wat you guys wen go fo see? One guy dat talk fo God? Dass right! I tell you, John, he mo den jus one guy dat talk fo God.

27.verse: Dis da guy da Bible wen talk bout befo time, ‘I goin send my messenja guy befo you. He goin make everyting ready fo you, befo you come ova dea.’ ”

28.verse: An Jesus say, “I like tell you guys dis: No mo nobody eva wen born dat mo importan den John. Even da mostes small kine guy dat get God fo his King, he mo importan den John.”

29.verse: Wen da guys dat take money fo tax an all da odda peopo wen hear dat, dey wen say, “Yeah! God everytime do da right ting!” Cuz dey wen listen John, an he wen baptize dem.

30.verse: But da Pharisee guys an da teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules, dey neva do wat God like dem fo do, an dey neva like John fo baptize dem.

31.verse: Jesus say, “But da peopo nowdays, how dem?

32.verse: Dey jalike da kids sitting inside da open market place, an yelling to dea friends, ‘Eh! Us guys play da flute fo you guys, but you guys no like dance! Us guys sing one sad funeral song, but you guys no like cry.’

33.verse: Same ting, wen John Da Baptiza Guy show up, he skip food plenny, an he no drink wine. Dass why you guys say, ‘He get one bad kine spirit in charge a him!’

34.verse: But me, I da Guy Dass Fo Real. I come, I eat, I drink, an you guys say, ‘You know wat? Dis guy everytime eating an drinking! He friends wit da tax guys, an da odda kine guys dat get bad name too.’

35.verse: No matta wat me an John do, you guys no like! But da good guy who get da smarts from God, da tings he do, goin make proof dat he right.”

36.verse: Jesus Go Eat One Pharisee Guy House - One Pharisee guy wen aks Jesus fo come his house fo eat. So Jesus wen go ova dea an wen sit down by da table.

37.verse: Had one wahine from dat town dat wen do bad stuff an wen fool aroun. She wen hear dat Jesus stay sitting inside da Pharisee guyʼs house, an she bring one bottle made from da alabaster kine stone, full wit perfume.

38.verse: She wen stand behind Jesus by his feet. She stay crying, an her tears wen make his feet wet. Den she wen wipe his feet wit her hair, kiss um, an wen pour da perfume on top dem.

39.verse: Wen da Pharisee guy dat wen aks him fo come wen see dat, he wen tink, “Eh, if dis guy was one guy dat talk fo God fo real kine, den he know wat kine wahine stay touching him, dat she one wahine dat do bad kine stuff.”

40.verse: Jesus wen tell him, “Simon, I like tell you someting.” Simon say, “Yeah, Teacha? Tell me.”

41.verse: “Had two guys dat wen owe some money to one guy dat lend money. One guy wen owe him five hundred silva coins, an da odda guy fifty.

42.verse: Dey no can pay him back. So da guy wen tell, ‘Dass okay. Foget um.’ Which guy you tink goin get mo plenny love an aloha fo him?”

43.verse: Simon say, “I tink da guy dat wen owe him moa.” Jesus say, “Right on.”

44.verse: Den Jesus wen turn aroun to da wahine, an tell Simon, “You see dis wahine? I wen come inside yoa house, an you neva give me water fo wash my feet. But she wen wash um wit her tears, an wen wipe um wit her hair.

45.verse: You neva say ‘Aloha’ an give me one kiss, but wen I wen come inside yoa house, dis wahine no pau kiss my feet.

46.verse: You neva give me olive oil fo my head fo show me respeck, but she wen cover my feet wit da perfume.

47.verse: Az why I tell you, she wen do plenny bad kine stuff, but God wen let her go awready an hemo her shame fo all dat. An how come he wen do dat? Cuz she get plenny love an aloha fo God now, az why. Da guy dat wen do litto bit bad stuff, an God wen hemo his shame fo dat, he ony goin get litto bit love an aloha fo God.”

48.verse: Den Jesus tell da wahine, “God wen hemo da shame fo all da bad kine stuff you wen do.”

49.verse: An da odda guys sitting ova dea wen start fo talk to each odda, “Who dis guy dat even hemo da shame fo da bad kine stuff?”

50.verse: Jesus tell da wahine, “Cuz you wen trus me, God wen take you outa da bad kine stuff you stay in. Go, an yoa heart can rest inside.”

1.verse: Some Wahines Go Wit Jesus - Afta dat Jesus wen go thru da big an da small towns, an he teach da Good Stuff bout how peopo can get God fo dea King. Da Twelve Guys wen go wit him.

2.verse: Befo time Jesus wen make some wahines come good from da bad kine spirits an all kine sick. Dey all wen go too: Mary da Magdala wahine, dat had seven bad kine spirits dat wen take ova her befo, an Jesus wen make um let her go.

3.verse: An Joanna, Kuzaʼs wife, she wen go. (Kuza, he da guy dat stay in charge, King Herodʼs house.) An Susanna, an plenny odda wahines, dey all wen go too. Da wahines wen use dea own money fo help take care Jesus dem.

4.verse: Da Story Bout Da Farma An Da Seeds - Plenny peopo stay coming by Jesus from plenny towns, an he wen teach um wit one story.

5.verse: He say, “You wen hear da story bout da farma guy? He wen go plant seed. He throw da seeds all ova da groun fo plant. Some seeds fall down by da side da trail. Da peopo wen walk on top um, an da birds wen go eat um up.

6.verse: Some seeds fall down on top da rocks, an grow, an den dry up, cuz no mo water inside da dirt.

7.verse: Odda seeds wen fall down inside da kine bushes wit kuku. Da seeds an da bushes grow up togedda, an da bushes wit kuku choke um.

8.verse: Odda seeds, dey fall down inside da good dirt, an dey wen grow good, an come up plenny, one hundred times mo den da farma wen plant.” Afta dat Jesus say, “If you guys hear dis, den tink bout um!”

9.verse: How Come Jesus Teach Wit Stories? - Da guys Jesus teach wen aks him, “Wat dis story mean?”

10.verse: He tell, “God let you guys know all da stuff bout how he stay King. But I teach da odda peopo wit stories, so jalike da Bible say, ‘dey see, but dey no can see fo real kine. Dey hear, but dey no can hear fo real kine.’ ”

11.verse: Jesus Tell Wat Da Story Mean - Den Jesus tell, “Dis wat da story mean. Da seed, dass wat God say.

12.verse: Da seeds dat fall down on top da trail, dass jalike da peopo dat hear. But da Devil come take away wat God say from inside dea heart, so dey no can trus God. Dass why God no can take um outa da bad kine stuff dey do.

13.verse: Da seeds on top da rocks, dass da peopo dat take wat God say, an dey stay good inside wen dey hear um. Dey trus God litto bit, but wen get hard time dey pau trus, cuz dey no mo root, jalike da seeds on top da rocks.

14.verse: Da seeds dat fall down inside da bushes wit kuku, dass da peopo dat hear, but den dey worry plenny, an dey like come rich an get plenny stuffs, an dey like play aroun all da time. All dat stuff grab um, an choke um. Dey no rememba wat God say, jalike da seeds dat no mo wheat cuz dey stay inside da bushes wit kuku.

15.verse: But ho! Da seeds dat fall down inside da good dirt, dass jalike da peopo dat hear an rememba wat God say. Dey get good heart, do da right ting, an no give up. Dey jalike da seeds dat give good kine wheat.”

16.verse: Da Lamp Unda Da Bucket - “You no light one lamp an cover um wit one bucket, o put um unda da bed. No way! You goin put um on top one shelf so da guys dat come inside dea can see da light.

17.verse: Cuz everyting dat stay hiding, bumbye God goin show um, an everyting dass hard fo undastan he goin make um clear, so da peopo can undastan.

18.verse: Tink! You gotta listen good! Da guy dat listen good goin undastan plenny, but da guy dat no listen good, God goin take away everyting he tink he know.”

19.verse: Jesus Mudda An Bruddas - Dat time Jesus mudda an bruddas wen come fo see him, but dey no can come near him cuz get choke plenny peopo ova dea.

20.verse: One guy tell Jesus, “Eh, yoa mudda an yoa bruddas, dey outside, an dey like talk to you.”

21.verse: Jesus tell da guy, “My mudda an my bruddas? Da peopo dat hear wat God say an do um, dey da ones az my mudda an bruddas fo real.”

22.verse: Jesus Make Da Storm Pau - One time Jesus wen tell his guys, “We go da odda side da lake.” So dey go inside da boat an wen start fo go.

23.verse: Wen dey stay sailing, Jesus wen sleep. One big wind storm wen come down on top da lake, an da waves was bussing ova da boat, so da boat almos wen huli. Dey was in bad shape.

24.verse: Da guys wen go wake Jesus up, an say, “Eh, Boss! We goin mahke!” Jesus get up. He scold da wind an da big waves. Da storm wen pau, an everyting come nice.

25.verse: He tell his guys, “How come you guys no trus me?” Dey come real scared. Dat blow dea minds. Dey tell each odda, “Eh, who dis? Even da wind an da waves do wat he tell um!”

26.verse: Jesus Make One Guy Wit Bad Kine Spirits Come Good - Dey wen sail da odda side da lake from Galilee, wea da Gerasa town peopo get dea fields.

27.verse: Jesus wen go on top da beach. One guy from dat town wen come dat get some bad kine spirits in charge a him. Long time dat guy neva wear clotheses o stay inside one house, but he stay inside da caves wea dey put da mahke guys.

28.verse: Plenny times befo, one bad spirit wen grab um. No matta if da guy had chains on his hands an feet, an one nodda guy wen watch um real good, he still wen broke da chains. An da bad spirit wen make da guy go odda places wea nobody stay. So wen da spirit spock Jesus, da guy yell, an fall down by Jesus feet. Jesus tell da bad spirit, “Let go da guy!” Da spirit yell, “Eh, wat you like do to me, Jesus? Da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods, I know you his Boy! I beg you, no hurt me!”

29.verse: Plenny times befo, one bad spirit wen grab um. No matta if da guy had chains on his hands an feet, an one nodda guy wen watch um real good, he still wen broke da chains. An da bad spirit wen make da guy go odda places wea nobody stay. So wen da spirit spock Jesus, da guy yell, an fall down by Jesus feet. Jesus tell da bad spirit, “Let go da guy!” Da spirit yell, “Eh, wat you like do to me, Jesus? Da God Dass Mo Importan Den All Da Odda Gods, I know you his Boy! I beg you, no hurt me!”

30.verse: Jesus aks da guy, “Wat yoa name?” He tell, “My name ‘Army.’ ” He say dat cuz uku paila bad kine spirits wen take ova him.

31.verse: Da bad kine spirits, dey beg Jesus plenny times fo no make um go suffa inside da Devilʼs Deep Dark Hole.

32.verse: Had plenny pigs dat stay grinding on top da hill. Da bad kine spirits wen beg Jesus, “If you go make us let da guy, we like go take ova da pigs, yeah?” Jesus tell um, “Go!”

33.verse: So da bad kine spirits wen let go da guy, an go take ova da pigs. An den all da pigs wen run down one steep hill, an fall inside da lake, an drown.

34.verse: Wen da guys taking care da pigs wen see wat wen happen, dey wen run go tell everybody inside da town an all ova da place wat dey wen see.

35.verse: All da peopo wen come fo look. Wen dey come by Jesus, dey spock da guy, an he no mo da bad kine spirits now. He stay sitting by Jesus feet wit clotheses on, an he tink good stuff now. An all da peopo wen come real scared.

36.verse: Da guys dat wen see wat wen happen, dey tell da peopo bout da guy dat da bad kine spirits wen take ova, dat he stay good now.

37.verse: Den all da peopo from aroun Gerasa town aks Jesus fo go way from dem, cuz dey real, real scared. So he go inside da boat an go way.

38.verse: Da guy dat no mo bad kine spirits now, he wen beg Jesus if he can go wit him, but Jesus tell him, “No, brah. No can.” Jesus tell,

39.verse: “Go home. Tell how God wen help you plenny.” So da guy go way an tell all ova da town how Jesus wen help him plenny.

40.verse: One Mahke Girl an One Sick Wahine - Wen Jesus come back, plenny peopo feel good inside fo see um, cuz dey stay waiting fo him.

41.verse: Had one leada guy from da Jewish church, name Jairus. Right den an dea he wen come an go down by Jesus feet. He beg Jesus fo go his house,

42.verse: cuz his ony girl, bout twelve years old, litto mo mahke ova dea. Wen Jesus stay going, get plenny peopo stay jamming him.

43.verse: Had one wahine ova dea dat stay bleeding twelve years. She wen pay everyting she get to da doctas, but nobody can make her come good.

44.verse: She wen come behind Jesus, touch his clotheses. Right den an dea she wen pau bleed.

45.verse: Jesus say, “Who wen touch me?” Everybody tell him, “Not me!” Peter say, “Boss, get uku paila peopo aroun you, jamming agains you.”

46.verse: But Jesus tell, “Somebody wen touch me. I know, cuz power wen go out from inside me.”

47.verse: Den da wahine wen know dat dey goin find out, an she come an go down by Jesus feet, shaking real hard. In front all da peopo she wen tell how come she wen touch him, an how quick time she wen come good.

48.verse: Jesus tell her, “Sista, you trus me, dass why you come good awready. Go. Now yoa heart can stay rest inside.”

49.verse: Wen Jesus still talking, one guy come from Jairus house, an say, “Yoa girl mahke awready. No need bodda da teacha no moa.”

50.verse: Wen Jesus hear dat, he turn aroun an tell Jairus, “No scared, ony trus me, an she goin come good.”

51.verse: Wen Jesus wen come Jairus house, he ony let Peter, John, an James, an da fadda an mudda go inside wit him, an no odda peopo.

52.verse: Same time all da peopo wen cry an moan fo her. Jesus tell, “Stop crying! She not mahke, she ony stay sleeping.”

53.verse: An dey all wen laugh an make fun a him, cuz dey know she mahke.

54.verse: But Jesus take her hand an say, “Eh litto girl, get up!”

55.verse: Right den an dea her life wen come back, an she wen get up. Den Jesus tell um, “Give her someting fo eat.”

56.verse: An her fadda an mudda, wen blow dea minds. But Jesus tell um, “Eh! No tell nobody wat wen happen, aah.”

1.verse: Jesus Send His Twelve Guys All Ova - Jesus tell his twelve guys fo come togedda, an he give um da right an da power fo make all da bad kine spirits let go peopo, an make all kine sick peopo come good.

2.verse: Den he send um all ova fo tell everybody bout how dey can get God fo dea King, an fo make da sick peopo come good.

3.verse: He tell um, “No take notting fo da trip; no walking stick, no bag, no bread, no money, no extra clotheses.

4.verse: Wen you guys go somebodyʼs house, stay dea till you go way from dat town.

5.verse: If da peopo inside da town no like you guys come, an no like hear wat you guys teach, den wen you guys go outa da town, dust da dust from yoa feet, fo show da peopo dea dat God no like if dey no listen.”

6.verse: So da guys wen go out an go from one small town to anodda, an dey teach da Good Stuff From God, an make da sick peopo all ova da place come good.

7.verse: King Herod Come All Mix Up - Dat time King Herod wen hear bout all dat wen happen. An he come all mix up, cuz some peopo wen say John Da Baptiza Guy, he wen come back alive.

8.verse: Odda peopo say dat Elijah wen show up. An oddas dat one guy dat wen talk fo God long time ago wen come back alive.

9.verse: Herod say, “I wen make my army guys cut off Johnʼs head. Den who dis guy? I stay hearing bout all da kine stuff he do.” An Herod wen like see Jesus.

10.verse: Jesus Feed Five Tousand Guys - Da guys Jesus wen send all ova da place come back, an dey tell Jesus wat dey wen do. Den he take dem wit him an dey go way by demself to Betsaida town.

11.verse: But all da peopo wen hear dat Jesus dem stay ova dea, so dey go dea too. Jesus give da peopo his aloha. He tell um bout how dey can get God fo dea King, an he make da sick peopo come good.

12.verse: Wen da sun stay going down, da twelve guys wen come by him an say, “Send all da peopo away so dey can go da small towns an odda places aroun hea an get someting fo eat an some place fo sleep, cuz ova hea no mo notting.”

13.verse: Jesus say, “You guys, you give um someting fo eat.” Dey say, “We ony get five breads an two fishes. You like us go buy food fo all dis peopo?”

14.verse: (Had bout five tousand guys ova dea.) But he tell his guys, “Make everybody sit down, like fifty ova hea, fifty ova dea.”

15.verse: His guys wen do dat, an everybody sit down.

16.verse: Jesus take da five breads an da two fishes. He look up da sky, an tell God “Eh God! You good heart fo give da peopo food!” an broke da bread an da fishes. Den he give um to his guys fo give to da peopo.

17.verse: Dey all wen eat, an come full. His guys wen take twelve big baskets an fill um up wit da lefovas.

18.verse: Wat Peter Say Bout Jesus - One time Jesus wen pray in one place wea neva have nobody, an ony his guys wen stay dea wit him. He aks um, “So! Who da peopo tink me?”

19.verse: Da guys say, “Some guys say you John Da Baptiza Guy. Odda guys say Elijah. An odda guys say you one guy dat wen talk fo God long time ago, an now you come back alive.”

20.verse: He aks dem, “Kay den, wat bout you guys? Who you guys tink me?” Peter say, “You da Christ Guy, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send.”

21.verse: Jesus Tell Um He Gotta Mahke An Come Back Alive - Jesus tell um, “You guys betta not tell nobody dat I da Christ Guy, da Spesho One God wen send.”

22.verse: He say, “I da Guy Dass Fo Real. I gotta suffa plenny stuff. Da older leadas, an da main priest guys, an da teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules, dey goin figga I not Da Guy Dass Fo Real, an dey goin kill me fo dat. But day numba three, I goin come back alive.”

23.verse: Den he tell all dem, “Whoeva like stick wit me, dey gotta make up dea mind dat dey no goin be dea own boss no moa. Goin be hard, jalike dying on top one cross every day. An den dey can stick wit me.

24.verse: If bodda you dat you goin mahke, fo shua you goin mahke. But if you like do everyting you do fo me, an no bodda you if you mahke fo dat, den you goin live fo real kine.

25.verse: Dis poho: one guy get everyting inside dis world, but end up losing himself, an no mo life inside.

26.verse: If one guy stay shame a me an da tings I say, den me, da Guy Dass Fo Real, I goin be shame a him wen I come back. I goin be awesome jalike my Fadda, wen I come back wit my spesho angel guys.

27.verse: Dass true, wat I telling you guys: Some a da peopo dat stay hea now, dey no goin mahke befo dey see how stay wen God da King.”

28.verse: Jesus Come Diffren - Bout one week lata, Jesus wen take Peter, John, an James wit him up one mountain fo pray.

29.verse: Wen he stay praying, his face wen change an he look real diffren. His clotheses come bright jalike da lightning.

30.verse: Right den an dea two guys, Moses an Elijah, come outa no wea, an dey stay talking wit Jesus.

31.verse: Dey awesome. Dey talk bout how Jesus goin do everyting, jalike God wen say, cuz pretty soon he goin mahke Jerusalem side.

32.verse: Peter an his friends wen sleep. But wen dey wake up, dey see Jesus, an da two guys standing dea wit him. An he look awesome.

33.verse: Wen da two guys wen start fo go way from Jesus, Peter tell him, “You know wat, Boss? Good we stay ova hea! We goin make three shacks, one fo you, one fo Moses, an one fo Elijah!” (He neva know wat he was saying.)

34.verse: Wen Peter still talking, one cloud wen come an cover um. An his guys come real scared.

35.verse: Den one voice from inside da cloud say, “Dis my boy, da One I wen send. Listen to him!”

36.verse: Wen da voice pau talk, ony Jesus stay dea. Dat time da guys he teaching no tell nobody bout wat dey wen see.

37.verse: Jesus Make One Bad Kine Spirit Let Go One Boy - Da nex day dey wen go down from da mountain, an plenny peopo come fo meet Jesus.

38.verse: One guy wen yell, “Teacha! I beg you, look my boy, my ony boy!

39.verse: Everytime one bad kine spirit take um ova, right den an dea he yell, an roll aroun on top da groun, an foam come outa his mout. Da bad kine spirit hurt him everytime, an no like let him go.

40.verse: I wen beg yoa guys fo throw um out, but dey no can.”

41.verse: Jesus say, “You guys! Nowdays nobody even trus God! You guys ony know how do wrong stuff! How long I gotta be wit you guys an put up wit you guys? Bring da boy ova hea!”

42.verse: Wen da boy stay coming, da bad spirit wen throw him down on top da groun an da boy shake all ova. But Jesus wen scold da bad spirit, an make da boy come good, an wen give him back to his fadda.

43.verse: Dat wen blow da peopoʼs minds wen dey see Godʼs awesome power. Jesus Tell Again Dat He Goin Mahke - Da peopo still tinking plenny bout all da stuff Jesus stay doing, an he wen tell his guys,

44.verse: “No foget wat I goin tell you now! I da Guy Dass Fo Real. But goin get one guy goin set me up an turn me ova to some odda guys.”

45.verse: But Jesus guys neva know wat dat mean. God neva let dem undastan till lata, an dey scared fo aks Jesus.

46.verse: Who Da Numba One Guy? - Jesus guys wen start fo make argue bout who da numba one guy.

47.verse: Jesus wen know wat dey tinking, so he tell one small kid fo stand by him.

48.verse: Den he tell um, “Whoeva take in one small kid jalike dis kid cuz da kid my guy, dat guy take me in too. An whoeva take me in, dey take in da One dat wen send me too. Da guy dat put himself last, he goin be mo importan, jalike he goin come first.”

49.verse: Whoeva Not Agains You, Dey Fo You - John say, “Boss, we wen spock one guy making da bad kine spirits let go da peopo, an using yoa name fo do um. An we tell him fo no do dat, cuz he no come from us guys.”

50.verse: Jesus tell him an da odda guys, “No stop him, cuz whoeva not agains you, dey fo you.”

51.verse: Da Peopo Inside One Small Town Inside Samaria No Like Jesus - Da time stay near wen Jesus going up to da sky, an he make up his mind fo go Jerusalem.

52.verse: He send some messenja guys befo him so dey can get tings ready fo him. Dey go inside one small town Samaria side fo find one place fo stay dat nite.

53.verse: But da peopo ova dea, dey no like him fo stay dea, cuz he going Jerusalem, an dey no like Jerusalem peopo.

54.verse: Wen his guys James an John see dat, dey aks him, “Boss, you like us tell God fo send down fire from da sky fo kill um?”

55.verse: But Jesus turn aroun an scold dem.

56.verse: An dey wen go one nodda small town.

57.verse: Da Guys Dat Say Dey Like Go Wit Jesus - Jesus dem stay walking down one road, an one guy tell him, “I going wit you wea eva you go.”

58.verse: Jesus tell him, “Da foxes get hole fo house, an da birds get nest. But me, Da Guy Dass Fo Real, I no mo no place fo lay down.”

59.verse: He tell anodda guy, “Come wit me. Be my guy.” But da guy say, “First let me go bury my fadda.”

60.verse: Jesus say, “You gotta let da guys dat no mo life inside bury dea own mahke guys. But you, go tell da peopo how dey can get God fo dea King.”

61.verse: Anodda guy say, “Boss, I goin wit you, but first let me go back fo tell my ohana goodbye.”

62.verse: Jesus say, “Da guy dat stay plowing da field, den look back, everyting come kapakahi. Dat kine guy no good fo work fo God da King.”

1.verse: Jesus Send Out Seventy-Two Guys - Afta dat da Boss Jesus wen pick seventy-two odda guys dat he like send out two by two, so dey can go befo him, every town an place wea he goin go lata on.

2.verse: He tell um, “Get plenny peopo, dey jalike da crops, but ony get litto bit guys fo bring um in. So, aks da Boss Up Dea dat own da crops fo send out guys fo bring um in.

3.verse: Go! I send you guys out jalike baby sheeps wea da wild wolfs stay.

4.verse: “No take yoa money bag o odda bag o extra slippas, an no stop fo talk story wen you go down da road.

5.verse: Wen you go inside one house, first say, ‘I come fo aks God fo make you guys heart rest inside, fo all you guys inside dis house.’

6.verse: If one guy wit good heart stay dea, you goin make him stay good inside. If his heart not good, wat you say goin come back to you.

7.verse: Stay inside dat house, an eat an drink wateva dey give you. Cuz dass good dey give you someting fo da work you do. No move aroun from one house to anodda.

8.verse: “Weneva you come to one town an da peopo like you stay ova dea wit dem, eat da food dey give you.

9.verse: Make da sick peopo dat stay dea come good, an tell um, ‘God stay King hea wit you guys now.’

10.verse: “But wen you go inside one town an da peopo no like you stay dea, go down da streets an say,

11.verse: ‘Da dust from yoa town dat stick on our feet, we wipe um off fo show you guys dat God no like, cuz you guys no listen. But you betta know dis fo shua: God stay King hea now.’

12.verse: I telling you guys dis: Wen everybody stand in front God da Judge, he goin punish da peopo from Sodom town cuz dey wen do plenny bad kine stuff befo time. But goin be mo easy fo dem, den fo da peopo inside da town dat no like hear wat you guys say!”

13.verse: Da Peopo Inside Some Towns No Trus - Jesus say, “Auwe you guys from Korazin town! You goin get it, cuz you neva listen! Auwe you guys from Betsaida town! You goin get it too, cuz you neva listen! If I wen do da kine awesome stuff fo show my power to da peopo from Tyre an Sidon towns, jalike I wen do fo you guys, long time awready da peopo ova dea wen show dey shame fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an like pau do um. An dey wen sit down an put on one gunny bag, an put ash on top dea head fo show dey sorry.

14.verse: Bumbye goin be mo easy fo da peopo from Tyre an Sidon towns wen dey stand in front God da Judge, den fo you guys.

15.verse: An you guys from Capernaum town, you tink God goin take you up in da sky wit him, o wat? No way! Mo like he goin throw you guys down inside Hell, cuz you guys neva listen!”

16.verse: Jesus tell his guys, “Whoeva hear you, dey hear me too. Whoeva no take you, dey no take me too. Whoeva no take me, dey no take da One dat wen send me.”

17.verse: Da Seventy-Two Guys Come Back - Da seventy-two guys come back, an dey stay real good inside. Dey say, “Boss, even da bad kine spirits do wat we say, cuz we yoa guys, an we use yoa name.”

18.verse: Jesus tell um, “I wen see da Devil, dat time God wen throw um down from da sky jalike da lightning.

19.verse: Listen! I wen give you guys da power so you can walk on top da snakes an da scorpions, an you guys get da power fo win ova da guy dat stay agains us, da Devil. You guys get plenny mo power den da Devil get. An notting goin hurt you guys.

20.verse: But no stay good inside jus cuz da bad spirits do wat you tell um. Stay good inside cuz God get you guys names inside his book inside da sky.”

21.verse: Jesus Stay Good Inside - Dat time Godʼs Spesho Spirit wen make Jesus stay real good inside. An he say, “Fadda, you da Boss all ova da sky an da world. Mahalo plenny, cuz you wen hide all dis stuff from da smart guys an da guys dat know plenny stuff, an you wen show um to da small kids. Dass wat you like do.”

22.verse: Jesus tell, “My Fadda give me everyting, you know. Nobody know me like my Fadda know me. An nobody know my Fadda fo real kine, ony me, I know him, an da peopo I like show him, dey know him too.”

23.verse: Den Jesus wen turn aroun to his guys an tell um (but he neva tell da odda peopo), “You guys stay good inside cuz you see da stuff you see!

24.verse: I telling you, Plenny kings an plenny guys dat wen talk fo God wen like see an hear da stuff you guys see an hear, but dey neva.”

25.verse: Da Good Guy From Samaria - One teacha dat teach Godʼs Rules wen stand up fo aks Jesus one question fo trick him. He say, “Teacha, wat I gotta do fo get da real kine life dat stay to da max foeva?”

26.verse: Jesus say, “Tell me, wat Godʼs Rules say inside da Bible?”

27.verse: He say, “Get love an aloha fo da Boss yoa God wit all yoa heart, an wit everyting inside you, an wit how you tink, an wit all yoa power. An get love an aloha fo everybody jalike you get love fo yoaself.”

28.verse: Jesus say, “Dass right! Do dat an you goin live fo real kine.”

29.verse: But da guy like make himself look good, so he aks, “Wat you mean, love an aloha fo everybody?”

30.verse: Jesus say, “Had one guy. He wen go Jericho town from Jerusalem. Den had some guys dat wen jump him, rip him off, bus him up, an leave him dea fo mahke.

31.verse: Bumbye one Jewish priest guy come dat same road. He spock da guy, an go da odda side.

32.verse: Same ting, one guy from da Levi ohana dat help da prieses, he spock him, an go da odda side too.

33.verse: Den one guy from Samaria going dat road wen come wea da guy stay, spock him, an get pity fo him.

34.verse: He go by him, put olive oil an wine on top his cuts, an wrap um up. He put da guy on top his own donkey, an bring him by da hotel, an take care him.

35.verse: Da nex day he take out two silva coins an give um to da boss fo da hotel, an say, ‘Take care him, an wen I come back I give you wateva you wen pay.’

36.verse: “Now, wat you tink? From da three guys dat wen pass, who wen get mo love an aloha fo da guy dose guys wen bus up?”

37.verse: Da teacha guy say, “Da guy dat wen show pity fo him.” Jesus say, “Go, make lidat.”

38.verse: Jesus Go See Marta An Mary - Jesus an da guys he teach wen go down one road, an dey come to one small town. One wahine name Marta stay dea. She wen tell um fo come inside her house.

39.verse: She get one sista name Mary, an Mary wen sit down by Jesus feet an listen to wat he say.

40.verse: But wen bodda Marta cuz ony her was doing all da work, an she come an tell, “Boss, you no care dat my sista wen leave me all by myself fo do everyting? Tell her fo come help me!”

41.verse: Da Boss wen tell Marta, “Marta! You bum out, an you worry bout plenny stuff,

42.verse: but you ony need one ting. Mary wen pick da mo betta ting, an nobody can take dat away from her.”

1.verse: Jesus Teach His Guys How Fo Pray - One time Jesus stay pray in one place. Wen he pau pray, one guy he teaching tell um, “Boss, teach us guys fo pray, jalike John wen teach his guys.”

2.verse: Jesus say, “Dis how you pray: ‘Fadda, We like all da peopo know fo shua how awesome you stay, An dat you stay good an spesho. We like you come King fo everybody now.

3.verse: Give us our food fo today an every day.

4.verse: Let us go, an hemo our shame Fo all da bad kine stuff we do to you, Jalike we let da odda guy go, An we no stay huhu at him Fo all da bad kine stuff he do to us. No let us get chance fo do bad kine stuff.’ ”

5.verse: An he tell his guys, “Tink! If you go one friendʼs house at midnite an tell um, ‘My friend, lend me three loaf bread,

6.verse: cuz my odda friend stay going on one trip, an he wen come my house, an I no mo notting fo give him fo eat.’

7.verse: Den if yoa friend inside his house tell you, ‘No bodda me! Da door stay lock awready, an me an my kids stay in bed. I no can get up fo give you anyting.’

8.verse: So, wat? I tell you, even if he yoa friend, he no goin get up an give you da bread. Still yet, cuz you no shame, an you stay aksing him, he goin get up an give you everyting you need.

9.verse: So I tell you: Aks, an you goin get. Look, you goin find. Knock, da door goin open fo you.
