10.verse: All da peopo dat aks, goin get. Da guy dat look fo um, he goin find. An da guy dat knock da door, da door goin open fo him.

11.verse: If yoa boy aks you fo one fish, you give um one snake? Nah!

12.verse: If he aks you fo one egg, you give um one scorpion? Nah!

13.verse: Eh, you guys no good, but you know how fo give good kine stuff to yoa kids. Fo shua den, yoa Fadda inside da sky, he everytime good, an he goin give his Good an Spesho Spirit to you guys cuz you aks him fo um.”

14.verse: Jesus An Beelzebul - Had one guy dat get one bad kine spirit, dat make da guy so he no can talk. Jesus wen make da bad spirit let go da guy. Wen da bad spirit let um go, da guy dat no can talk wen start fo talk. An all da peopo, wen blow dea minds.

15.verse: But some guys say, “Nah! Was Beelzebul, da Devil. He da main leada guy fo da bad kine spirits, you know. Beelzebul, he da one wen give Jesus da power fo make dat spirit let go da guy, az why!”

16.verse: Odda guys wen try fo trick Jesus. Dey aks um fo show dem someting awesome from God in da sky fo make proof who him.

17.verse: But Jesus wen know wat dey tinking, an he tell um, “Da country dat go agains each odda, bus up itself. Da town o da ohana dat go agains each odda, no can stay strong.

18.verse: If da Devil make his own guys let go da peopo, den he going agains himself. How he goin stay one strong king? I saying dis cuz you guys wen say dat I make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo, cuz dea leada guy Beelzebul give me power fo do um.

19.verse: You guys say, dat da leada guy fo da bad kine spirits, he da one dat give me power fo make um let go da peopo. Kay den. Who give yoa guys da power fo make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo, aah? Da Devil give um da power, o wat? Not da Devil, dass fo shua. Yoa own guys goin show dat wat you say stay wrong.

20.verse: But if I make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo, cuz I get power from God, dat show dat God stay King, an he stay hea now by you guys, an you guys neva know.

21.verse: If one big moke get all his knifes an clubs fo guard his house, den his stuffs stay safe.

22.verse: But if one mo bigga moke come, an bus him up, he goin take away da knifes an clubs. Da first moke wen trus da knifes an clubs, but da mo bigga moke goin rip off all da stuffs, an split um up wit his own guys.

23.verse: If you no stay wit me, den you stay agains me. Da guy dat no work wit me, he ony work agains me.”

24.verse: Da Bad Spirit Come Back - “Wen one bad kine spirit let go one guy, dat spirit go all ova da boonies fo find one place fo rest, but no can find notting. Den he say, ‘Eh, mo betta I go back to da guy I wen take ova befo.’

25.verse: Wen he go dea, da guy stay clean inside, jalike wen you sweep one house an fix um up.

26.verse: Den da spirit go get seven odda spirits mo worse den him, an dey all go take ova da guy, an stay dea. So in da end, da guy dat had da bad kine spirit come mo worse den befo.”

27.verse: Stay Good Inside Fo Real Kine - Wen Jesus say dat, one wahine from da peopo wen say, “Da wahine dat wen born you an nurse you, she da one dat stay good inside!”

28.verse: But Jesus tell, “Da peopo dat hear wat God say, an do um, dey da ones dat stay real good inside!”

29.verse: Show Us Proof! - All da peopo wen stay jamming aroun Jesus, an he say, “Da peopo nowdays, dey do bad kine stuff. Dey everytime like see proof dat I fo real. An dey no goin see um. Dey ony goin see one proof jalike da guy Jonah wen make befo time.

30.verse: Jonah, he talk fo God long time ago. He wen make proof fo da peopo inside Nineveh town dat he come from God. O same jalike me, da Guy Dass Fo Real, I goin make proof fo da peopo nowdays, dat I come from God.

31.verse: Wen da peopo dat stay hea nowdays goin stand in front God da Judge, da Queen from Sheba far away da sout side goin stand up too, an make proof dat da peopo dat stay hea nowdays, dey not so smart. Cuz befo time she wen come from far away fo hear wat da akamai guy, King Solomon, wen say. An look! Get one guy mo importan den Solomon stay hea now. Dass me!

32.verse: Wen da peopo dat stay hea nowdays goin stand in front God da Judge, da peopo inside Nineveh town goin stand up too, an make proof dat da peopo dat stay hea nowdays, dey stay doing bad kine stuff. Cuz wen Jonah wen teach da Nineveh peopo, dey wen come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an pau do um. An now get one guy mo importan den Jonah stay hea now. Dass me!”

33.verse: Da Light Fo Da Body - “You no light one candle an den cover um up. You put um up on top one high place, yeah? Den everybody dat come inside da house can see da light.

34.verse: Da eye jalike one lamp fo inside yoa body. So if you get good heart fo help peopo, dass jalike yoa eye okay an you stay all light inside. But if you one greedy bugga, dass jalike yoa eye stay no good an you stay all dark inside!

35.verse: Make shua you get da light inside you, an you no stay dark inside.

36.verse: So, if you get good heart inside you, an you not greedy, dass jalike you get light inside you fo shua!”

37.verse: Jesus Scold Da Pharisee Guys An Da Teachas Dat Teach Godʼs Rules - Wen Jesus pau talk, one Pharisee guy wen aks him fo come inside his house fo eat. So he go inside, an sit down fo eat.

38.verse: But da Pharisee guy see dat Jesus no wash first befo he eat jalike dem, an he tink plenny bout dat.

39.verse: So da Boss Jesus tell him, “You know, you Pharisee guys, jalike you, you guys clean ony da outside a da cup an da plate. But inside yoa heart, you guys stay full a bad kine stuff, an you like stash everyting fo yoaself.

40.verse: You guys no tink! Da One dat wen make da outside, make da inside too!

41.verse: Give to da peopo dat no mo notting from da stuffs you get, an you know wat? Everyting goin come okay fo you guys, da way God see you.

42.verse: “Auwe you Pharisee guys! You goin get it! You guys give God ten percent a everyting, even da mint, an da rue spice, an all da odda kine herbs. But same time, no bodda you guys if you no do da right tings, an you guys no mo love an aloha fo God. Mo betta, make shua you do da right tings, an get love an aloha fo God, an no foget da ten percent too.

43.verse: “Auwe you Pharisee guys! You guys goin get it! You guys everytime like fo sit down in da spesho chairs inside da Jewish churches, an like all da peopo talk nice to you in da open market.

44.verse: Auwe! Cuz you guys mahke inside, jalike da graves dat da peopo no can see, an dey walk on top um cuz dey donno get one grave dea.”

45.verse: One teacha dat teach Godʼs Rules wen tell um, “Teacha, wen you say dat, you talk bad to us too.”

46.verse: Jesus say, “Auwe you teacha guys dat teach Godʼs Rules! You guys goin get it! Cuz you like make all kine rules! Jalike you stack up big heavy kine stuffs on top da peopoʼs shouldas, dat real hard fo carry. But you guys no like help da peopo fo do wat yoa rules say, even litto bit.

47.verse: Auwe you guys! Cuz you make nice tombs fo da guys dat wen talk fo God, but was yoa ancesta guys wen kill um.

48.verse: So you show you tink dass good, wat yoa ancesta guys wen do. Dey wen kill da guys dat wen talk fo God, an you guys make dea tombs!

49.verse: Dass why God wen know wat he talking bout wen he say, ‘I goin send um guys dat talk fo me, an guys I send all ova fo tell da Good Stuff, an dey goin kill some, an make oddas suffa.’

50.verse: So da peopo dat stay hea nowdays, dey goin get da blame fo all da guys dat peopo eva wen kill cuz dey talk fo God,

51.verse: from da first one Abel to Zekariah. Dey wen kill Zekariah right inside da temple yard, wit Godʼs spesho place one side, an da altar da odda side. Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis: Da guys dat stay hea nowdays, dey goin get all da blame.

52.verse: “Auwe, you teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules! You guys goin get it! You guys donno wat God say, an you no let da peopo dat like know wat he say find out. Jalike you guys wen take away da key fo open da door so peopo can know wat God stay say.”

53.verse: Wen Jesus go way from dat place, da teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules an da Pharisee guys wen start fo gang up on him, an try fo make him tell dem all kine stuff.

54.verse: Dey like trick him wit wat he tell dem so dey can bus him.

1.verse: Da Guys Dat Teach One Ting An Do Anodda - Bumbye uku plenny peopo wen come togedda, dat dey even step on top each odda. Jesus wen start fo talk to his guys first. He say, “Watch out fo da Pharisee guys, cuz dey teach one ting an do anodda. So watch out you no come like dem. Dey jalike da yeast fo make bread -- ony need litto bit fo change da whole bread.

2.verse: Cuz you know, everyting dat stay unda one cover, da peopo goin see um, an everyting dat stay hiding, dey goin find out.

3.verse: Wateva you say in da dark time, dey goin hear um wen come light. Wateva you wispa in somebodyʼs ear behind one door dat stay close, somebody goin yell um from da top a da house. So, no teach one ting an do anodda.”

4.verse: You Scared? - “My friends, I telling you, no scared da guys dat can kill yoa body, but afta dat, dey no can do notting mo worse den dat.

5.verse: But I show you who fo be scared bout -- betta be scared God, cuz he can kill yoa body an den he get da power fo throw you inside Hell. Yeah, I telling you, he da one you gotta be scared bout!

6.verse: Five sparrows cost ony two cents, yeah? But yet God no foget one a dem.

7.verse: God, he even know how much hairs you get on top yoa head. Fo him, you guys no need be scared, cuz you worth mo den plenny sparrows.

8.verse: Who Jesus? - “I telling you, whoeva say in front da peopo dat he my guy, I goin say in front Godʼs angel guys dat I know dat guy, cuz I da Guy Dass Fo Real.

9.verse: But da guy dat say in front da peopo dat he no like be my guy, I goin say in front Godʼs angel guys dat he not my guy.

10.verse: “Whoeva talk bad bout me, da Guy Dass Fo Real, God goin let dem go hemo da shame fo dat. But whoeva talk bad bout Godʼs Spesho Spirit, God no goin let dem go an hemo da shame fo dat.

11.verse: “Wen dey bring you guys in front da Jewish church peopo, o in front da leada guys, o da guys dat get plenny power, no worry wat you goin say,

12.verse: cuz dat time Godʼs Spesho Spirit goin tell you guys wat fo say.”

13.verse: Da Rich Guy Dat No Tink - Get plenny peopo ova dea, an one guy aks him, “Teacha, tell my brudda he gotta half half da stuff our fadda wen leave us, an give me my share.”

14.verse: Jesus say, “Eh, who wen give me da right fo judge dat, o fo half half da stuff an give you yoa share an yoa brudda his share?”

15.verse: Jesus tell da peopo, “Watch out! Make shua you no try get everyting fo yoaself, cuz you no goin ony live fo real kine by da plenny stuffs you get.”

16.verse: Den Jesus tell one story fo teach um: “One rich guy get one land, an he get plenny wheat.

17.verse: He tinking, ‘Wat I goin do? I no mo place fo store my wheat an odda stuffs.

18.verse: I know wat! I goin bus up my store houses an make um mo big, an inside I goin store all my wheat an odda stuffs.

19.verse: Den I goin tell myself, “Eh, fo shua I one lucky guy! I get plenny good stuffs store up fo long time. So I can take it easy, an eat an drink an party up!” ’

20.verse: But God say, ‘Eh Brah! You no tink! Tonite you goin mahke! Den who goin get all da stuffs you wen stack up?’

21.verse: “Dass wat goin happen to all da peopo dat make big stack stuffs fo demself, but God see um like dey no mo notting.”

22.verse: Trus God An No Worry - Den Jesus tell his guys, “Dass why I telling you guys, no worry bout notting, how you goin live, wat you goin eat. No worry bout yoa body, wat you goin wear.

23.verse: Wat you tink? You live ony fo food? No way! An yoa body ony fo clotheses? Not even!

24.verse: Tink bout da birds dat fly inside da sky. Dey no plant seed o get one crop o put um inside da store houses, but God feed dem. An you guys worth mo plenny den da birds!

25.verse: Wat one a you guys can worry ony, an dat make him stay alive one mo day?

26.verse: If you no can do dat, how come you worry bout da odda stuffs?

27.verse: Tink bout da flowers, how dey grow. Dey no work o make dea own clotheses. But I telling you, even King Solomon, wit all his awesome stuffs, neva get da kine awesome clotheses like da flowers.

28.verse: Da grass inside da field stay growing one day, an dey throw um on top da fire da nex day. Eh, God give da grass da kine clotheses like da flowers, so garans he goin give you guys clotheses even moa. You guys ony trus litto bit!

29.verse: So eh! No go worry bout wat you goin eat, o wat you goin drink. No worry bout um notting.

30.verse: All da diffren peopos dat donno God, dey try get all dat kine stuff. But yoa Fadda know dat you need all dat.

31.verse: Make God da Boss fo yoa life, cuz he da King, an he goin give you guys all dat kine stuff too.

32.verse: Da Rich Stuff Inside Da Sky - “You guys, you jalike baby sheeps. No scared, cuz yoa Fadda da King like give you everyting he get.

33.verse: Sell everyting you get an give da money to da peopo dat no mo notting. Get da kine money bag dat no goin get holes. Make shua you get da importan kine stuff from God inside da sky, dat stay foeva. Da steala guy no can steal um ova dea, an da bugs no can eat um up.

34.verse: Cuz you know, wateva kine stuffs stay da mos importan fo you, dass wea yoa heart stay.

35.verse: Da Workas Dat Stay Awake An Ready - “Betta be ready, jalike you put on yoa clotheses an get ready fo work, an leave da light on,

36.verse: jalike da worka guys dat wait fo dea boss, wen he come back from da wedding lu‛au. Wen he come knock da door, right den an dea dey open da door fo him.

37.verse: Wen da boss come back, goin be good fo da worka guys dat stay awake an watching. Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: Fo dem, da boss goin put on one workaʼs clotheses, make his workas sit down at da table, an bring um food.

38.verse: Wen da boss come back, goin be good fo da worka guys dat stay ready, no matta he show up real late nite time.

39.verse: Listen! If da guy inside da house wen know wat time da steala guy goin come, he no goin let um bus up da house.

40.verse: So you guys too, you betta be ready, cuz I da Guy Dass Fo Real, an wen you tink dat I no goin come back, I goin come back.”

41.verse: Da Good An Da Bad Worka - Peter say, “Boss, you telling dis story fo us o fo everybody?”

42.verse: Den Jesus da Boss wen say, “If get one luna guy dat smart an his boss trus him, dass da guy his boss goin put um in charge a da odda workas, fo give um dea food da right time.

43.verse: Wen da boss come back, dat luna guy goin stay good inside if he wen do wat da boss wen tell him fo do.

44.verse: Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis: Da boss goin put him in charge all his stuffs.

45.verse: But if da worka guy tink, ‘Long time my boss no come,’ an he beef wit da odda worka guys an da wahines, an he eat an drink an get drunk,

46.verse: dat guyʼs boss goin come back one day wen da luna guy no tink he goin come, an one time wen da luna guy donno. Da boss goin wipe out da luna guy an send um away wea da peopo stay dat no trus God.

47.verse: “Da worka guy dat know wat his boss like, an no get ready fo do um, an no do wat da boss like him fo do, his boss goin punish him real hard.

48.verse: But da worka guy dat donno wat his boss like um fo do, so he do someting bad, his boss goin ony punish him litto bit, cuz da guy neva know. So, if God give you everyting you need fo work fo him, you betta do um good job fo him.”

49.verse: Peopo Goin Fight Cuz A Jesus - “I wen come fo bring da fire on top da earth, an now I like da fire fo start.

50.verse: But first I gotta suffa plenny, an I get hard time now till dat pau.

51.verse: You tink I wen come to dis world fo help everybody come friends an no fight? I no come fo dat, but fo make um go agains each odda.

52.verse: From now, on goin get five peopo in one ohana dat stay fight each odda, three agains two, an two agains three.

53.verse: Dey goin stay agains each odda, da faddas agains dea boys, an da boys agains dea faddas, muddas agains dea girls, an girls agains dea muddas, mudda-in-laws agains dea daughta-in-laws, an daughta-in-laws agains dea mudda-in-laws.”

54.verse: You Can Figga Da Time - Jesus tell da peopo, “Wen you spock one black cloud coming up, right den an dea you say, ‘Goin rain,’ an dass wat happen.

55.verse: An wen you feel da kona wind blowing, you say, ‘Goin come hot,’ an dass wat happen.

56.verse: You guys say one ting an do anodda! You can figga wat goin happen from da earth an da sky. How come you no can figga da tings dat stay happening now?”

57.verse: Make Good Wit Yoa Brudda - “How come you no figga fo yoaself wat stay right?

58.verse: Wen you going in front da judge wit one guy dat stay agains you, try fo make good wit him befo you go ova dea. Cuz if you no do dat, he goin drag you in front da judge, an da judge goin give you to da police, an da police goin throw you in jail.

59.verse: I telling you, you gotta pay every penny you owe befo you can come out.”

1.verse: Come Sorry Fo All Da Bad Kine Stuff You Wen Do - Dat time some peopo stay dea, an tell Jesus bout da peopo from Galilee dat Pilateʼs army guys wen kill, same time dose peopo making sacrifice inside da temple.

2.verse: Jesus say, “You tink dem guys from Galilee wen do mo worse stuff den all da odda peopo from Galilee cuz dey wen suffa lidat?

3.verse: I telling you, no way! But if you guys no come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff you wen do, an pau do um, all you guys goin mahke too.

4.verse: Da eighteen guys dat wen mahke wen da tower near da Siloam water place wen fall down on top um -- you tink dey wen do mo worse stuff den all da odda peopo inside Jerusalem?

5.verse: I telling you, no way! But if you guys no come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff you wen do, an pau do um, all you guys goin mahke too.”

6.verse: Da Fig Tree Dat No Give Figs - Jesus wen tell um dis story fo teach um. “Had one guy dat wen get one fig tree dat stay growing inside his grape field. He go fo look if get fruit on um, but no mo fruit.

7.verse: So he wen tell da worka guy dat take care da field, ‘Three years now I stay come fo look if get fruit on dis fig tree, an no mo fig! Cut um down, fo no use up da dirt!’

8.verse: But da worka guy say, ‘Boss, leave um one mo year. I goin dig one ditch aroun um, an put fertiliza inside da ditch.

9.verse: If da tree give fruit nex year, dass good! If no give fruit, den cut um down!’ ”

10.verse: Jesus Make One Wahine Come Good - One Rest Day Jesus stay teaching inside one Jewish church.

11.verse: One wahine stay dea dat no can walk good. One bad kine spirit wen make her lidat eighteen years befo. She was bent ova an no can stand up strait.

12.verse: Jesus spock her, an tell her, “Sista, I make you come good from all yoa sick!”

13.verse: Den he put his hands on top her, an right den an dea she wen stand up strait an tell how awesome God stay.

14.verse: Da main leada guy fo da Jewish church wen come huhu cuz Jesus wen make her come good on da Rest Day. So, he tell all da peopo, “Get six days fo work. So, come let um make you come good on dem days, an not on da Rest Day!”

15.verse: Da Boss Jesus wen tell um, “You guys say one ting an do anodda! Every one a you guys hemo his cow o his donkey from da fence an lead um out fo get water on da Rest Day.

16.verse: But dis wahine from Abrahamʼs ohana, da Devil wen make her so she no can walk good fo eighteen years. You no tink dass okay fo hemo her from da sick dat wen make her no can walk, an do um on da Rest Day too, o wat?”

17.verse: Wat he say, wen make all da guys dat stay agains him come shame. But da peopo stay good inside cuz a all da awesome stuff he wen do.

18.verse: Da Mustard Seed Story - Jesus wen tell, “Wat you tink stay like, wen God stay King? Wat story I can tell you guys fo make um mo clear?

19.verse: Start small, den come big. Dass jalike one small mustard seed. One guy take um an plant um inside his yard. Da small seed grow up, an come one big bush, an da birds come down outa da sky an make house inside da branches.”

20.verse: Da Yeast Story - An Jesus tell, “Wat you tink stay like, wen God stay King?

21.verse: Make everyting come diffren, yeah? Dass jalike da yeast. One wahine take um an put um inside one big bowl wit flour. Bumbye da whole bread come diffren cuz a da yeast.”

22.verse: Da Skinny Door - Jesus wen go thru da big an small towns, an teach. He stay going Jerusalem.

23.verse: One guy wen aks him, “Boss, ony litto bit peopo goin come outa da bad kine stuff dey stay in, yeah?” Jesus tell him,

24.verse: “Make shua you try hard fo get God fo yoa King! You know, dass jalike you go inside one place thru one skinny door. Plenny peopo goin try fo go inside dea, but dey no can.

25.verse: Jalike da house owna goin pau eat, he go lock da door fo go sleep. Den you guys goin stand outside an start fo knock da door an say, ‘Eh Boss, open da door fo us!’ But he goin tell you guys, ‘I donno who you guys o wea you guys come from!’

26.verse: Den you guys goin say, ‘Eh! Us guys wen eat an drink wit you, an you wen teach us wen you was walking down our street.’

27.verse: He goin say one mo time, ‘I donno who you guys o wea you guys come from! Get outa hea, all you guys dat no do wass right!’

28.verse: You guys, you goin see Abraham, Isaac, an Jacob, an all da guys dat wen talk fo God, an dey goin stay dea wit God da King, but he goin throw you guys outside. Den you guys goin cry an grind yoa teet cuz you so mad an futless.

29.verse: Da peopo goin come from mauka side an makai side an all ova an dey goin sit an party wit God da King.

30.verse: An you know wat? Get guys dat peopo tink dey not importan now, an dey goin be da mos importan guys wen God stay King. Get odda guys dat peopo tink dey importan now, but dey no goin be importan wen God stay King.”

31.verse: Jesus Get Plenny Love An Aloha Fo Da Jerusalem Peopo - Dat time, had some Pharisee guys dat wen come by Jesus an tell him. “You betta get outa hea, an go anodda place, cuz King Herod like kill you, you know.”

32.verse: Jesus say, “Go tell dat bugga dat I say, ‘I make da bad kine spirits let go da peopo, an I make da peopo come good today an tomorrow, an day numba three, my work goin pau.’

33.verse: But I still gotta go today an tomorrow an da nex day, till I get to Jerusalem. You know, befo time da Jewish peopo wen kill da guys dat wen talk fo God, an Jerusalem was da place dey wen kill um.

34.verse: Auwe! You peopo inside Jerusalem! You wen throw rocks an kill da guys dat wen talk fo God befo time. Plenny times I wen like bring all yoa kids togedda, jalike one mudda hen bring togedda her chicks unda her wings, but you guys no like come by me!

35.verse: Auwe! Everyting all poho fo you guys awready! I tell you guys, you no goin see me again till bumbye wen you guys say, ‘Dis da Guy dat come fo da Boss Up Dea In Da Sky, an we like God do good tings fo him!’ ”

1.verse: Jesus Make One Sick Guy Come Good - One Rest Day, one Pharisee guy wen tell Jesus fo come his house fo eat. He one main leada fo da Pharisee guys. An da Pharisee guys an da guys dat teach Godʼs Rules wen watch Jesus real good.

2.verse: Had one sick guy dat show up ova dea in front Jesus. He get da kine sick dat make da arms an da legs come fat.

3.verse: Jesus wen aks da Pharisee guys an da guys dat teach Godʼs Rules, “You tink da Rules say dass good fo make one guy come good on da Rest Day, o wat?”

4.verse: But dey neva say notting. So he wen take da sick guy, an make um come good, an tell um fo go.

5.verse: Den he tell dem, “If da Rest Day, an one a you guys get one boy o one cow dat fall down inside one deep water hole, you goin pull um out right away, o wat? No matta da Rest Day, yeah?”

6.verse: But dey no can say notting.

7.verse: Da Guys Dat No Try Be Numba One - Jesus see dat befo dey eat, some guys ova dea wen pick da main places by da table. So he tell um dis fo teach um:

8.verse: He say, “Wen somebody tell you fo come da wedding lu‛au, no go sit down by da place fo da spesho wedding guys. You do dat, an den one guy mo importan den you goin come.

9.verse: Den da boss fo da lu‛au dat wen tell him an you fo come, he goin tell you, ‘Give dis guy yoa place.’ Den you goin come shame, an take da place fo da guy dass not importan.

10.verse: Mo betta, wen dey tell you fo come, go take da place fo da guy dass not importan. Den wen da boss fo da lu‛au come, he goin tell you, ‘My friend, ova hea mo betta.’ Den everybody dea goin get respeck fo you cuz a dat.

11.verse: Cuz whoeva make himself importan, no goin be importan, an whoeva make himself not importan, goin be importan.”

12.verse: Den Jesus tell da guy dat wen tell um fo come his place fo eat, “Wen you make one lunch o one dinna, no tell yoa friends, o yoa bruddas, o yoa ohana, o da rich guys nex door fo come. You do dat, an bumbye dey goin tell you fo come dea house, an dat goin pay you back fo wat you wen do.

13.verse: Mo betta, wen you make one lu‛au, tell da guys dat no mo notting fo come, da guys dat no can move, da guys dat no can walk, an da guys dat no can see.

14.verse: Den you goin stay good inside. Cuz dem guys no can pay you back bumbye. But God, he goin give you back someting good fo wat you wen do, wen da peopo dat wen do da right tings come back alive.”

15.verse: Da Story Bout Da Big Lu‛au - One guy dat stay sitting at da table wen hear dat, an he tell Jesus, “Fo shua, da guys dat goin sit down at Godʼs table wen he come King, dey can stay good inside!”

16.verse: Jesus tell, “You wen hear da story bout da guy dat wen make one big lu‛au? He aks plenny peopo fo come.

17.verse: Bumbye he send his worka guy fo tell da peopo, ‘Come on! Everyting stay ready!’

18.verse: But dey all wen start fo make up story. Da first guy wen tell da worka guy, ‘I jus wen buy one field, an I gotta go look um. Sorry.’

19.verse: Anodda guy say, ‘I jus wen buy ten cows fo plow, an I goin go see if dey strong nuff fo work. Sorry.’

20.verse: Anodda guy say, ‘I jus wen get married, so I no can go wit you.’

21.verse: Da worka guy go tell his boss. Da boss fo da house wen come huhu, an tell da worka guy, ‘Hurry up! Go out by da big an small roads inside town, an bring back da guys dat no mo notting, da guys dat no can move, da guys dat no can see, an da guys dat no can walk.’

22.verse: Bumbye da worka guy come an say, ‘We wen do wat you wen say, an still yet get room.’

23.verse: Da boss tell da worka guy, ‘Go out by da big an small roads in da country side an make da peopo come in, so my house can come full.

24.verse: I telling you now, da peopo I wen tell first, not one a dem goin taste my lu‛au food.’ ”

25.verse: Goin Cost Plenny Fo Be Jesus Guy - Plenny peopo wen go wit Jesus. He turn aroun to dem, an say,

26.verse: “Whoeva come by me, an get love an aloha fo dea fadda an mudda, dea wife an kids, dea bruddas an sistas -- an even fo demself too, mo den dey get love an aloha fo me, dey no can be my guy.

27.verse: Whoeva no like suffa fo me, o even mahke on top one cross, dey no can be my guy.

28.verse: “If one a you guys tink you goin make one tower, you betta sit down first an figga out how much goin cost, fo know if you get nuff money fo finish da tower, yeah?

29.verse: If you no do dat, you goin make da foundation, an den you no can make da rest. Den everybody goin bus laugh at you.

30.verse: Dey goin say, ‘Dis guy wen start fo make litto bit, an he no can finish da job.’

31.verse: “If one king going out wit ten tousand army guys fo fight anodda king, an da odda king come agains um wit twenty tousand army guys, da guy wit ony ten tousand army guys goin sit down first an figga if him an his guys strong nuff fo fight da odda king an his guys, yeah?

32.verse: If he not strong nuff, he goin send talka guys fo meet da odda king wen he still stay far away, an dey goin talk so dey no fight.”

33.verse: Jesus say, “Same ting. You guys no can be my guys if you no give up everyting you get.”

34.verse: Da No Good Salt - “Salt stay good. But if da salt no mo taste, no way you can make um work like salt again.

35.verse: Dat kine salt no good fo even da dirt o da manure pile. Ony ting can do, throw um away. If you hear dis, you betta listen!”

1.verse: Da Story Bout Da Lost Sheep - One time all da guys dat collect money fo tax fo da govermen an da odda guys dat get bad name wen come togedda by Jesus fo listen.

2.verse: But da Pharisee guys an da teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules wen squawk. Dey say, “Dis guy get peopo wit bad name fo his friends, an he eat wit dem.”

3.verse: So Jesus tell um dis fo teach um:

4.verse: He say, “Wat you tink? If one a you guys get hundred sheeps, but one sheep stay lost, you goin leave da ninety nine sheeps inside da boonies, an go look fo da one sheep dat stay lost, yeah?

5.verse: Wen you find um, you feel real good inside, an you put um on top yoa shouldas,

6.verse: an go home. Den you tell all yoa friends an da peopo nex door, ‘Come, party wit me! Cuz I wen find my sheep dat was lost.’

7.verse: I telling you, same ting, God an da angel guys inside da sky feel mo good inside cuz a one bad guy dat come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff he wen do, an like pau do um, den cuz a all da odda guys dat tink dey no need come sorry.”

8.verse: Da Story Bout Da Lost Coin - “O, wat you tink? If one wahine get ten silva coins, an she lose one, wat she goin do? She goin open one lamp, den she sweep da whole house, an look real good till she find um.

9.verse: An wen she find um, she goin tell all her friends an da peopo nex door, ‘Come, party wit me! Cuz I wen find my coin dat was lost!’

10.verse: I telling you, same ting, da angel guys dat stay wit God feel plenny good inside, everytime one bad guy come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff he wen do, an pau do um.”

11.verse: Da Story Bout Da Lost Boy - Jesus wen tell, “Had one guy dat get two boys.

12.verse: Da younga boy wen tell his fadda, ‘Papa, give me my share from all you get.’ So da fadda wen split all he get an give da boys dea share.

13.verse: Afta dat da younga boy wen get all his stuffs, sell his share an take da money, an go one far place. An ova dea he spend um all, cuz he no stay in charge a himself.

14.verse: Den, afta he spend all his money, get hard time ova dea. No mo food da whole place. An da boy, he no mo notting.

15.verse: Den da boy wen go by one guy from dat country, an da guy wen send him out inside his fields, fo feed da pigs.

16.verse: Man, da boy stay so hungry he like eat da pods da pigs was eating, an neva have nobody dat give him notting!

17.verse: “Den he wise up an tink, ‘Eh, how come?! All da guys dat work fo my fadda fo pay, dey get mo plenny food den dey can eat. Me, I so hungry ova hea, dat I litto mo mahke!

18.verse: Mo betta I go back wit my fadda. Den I tell um, “Papa, I wen do bad ting agains God in da sky, an agains you.

19.verse: I not good nuff fo be yoa boy. Let me work fo you fo pay, so den bumbye I pay you back.” ’

20.verse: Den he wen leave da place an go to his fadda. “He still far from da house wen his fadda wen spock him. His faddaʼs heart fill wit pity an he run. He hug his boy an kiss him.

21.verse: Da boy say, ‘Papa, I wen do bad ting agains God in da sky, an agains you. I not good nuff fo be yoa boy.’

22.verse: “But da fadda wen tell his worka guys, ‘Come quick! Hurry up! Go get one robe, da bestes one, an put um on him. Put one ring on top his finga an shoes on top his feet.

23.verse: Go get da bestes young cow an kill um. We goin make one party an eat an dance an sing!

24.verse: Cuz dis my boy. Jalike he wen mahke, but now he come back alive! Cuz he was lost, but now we find um!’ An dey wen make party.

25.verse: “Da older boy, he stay working inside da fields. Den he come near da house, an he hear da music wit da hula.

26.verse: So he aks one a da kids, ‘Eh, wass da haps?’

27.verse: “Da kid tell, ‘Yoa brudda wen come back home, an yoa fadda wen tell da worka guys fo kill da bestes young cow, cuz yoa fadda wen take him in, an everyting okay now!’

28.verse: “Da older brudda, he wen come real huhu. He no like go inside da house. So da fadda guy go outside an beg him fo come inside.

29.verse: He tell his fadda, ‘Look hea! I wen work fo you jalike one slave, plenny years! I neva go agains notting you wen tell me fo do! Wat you wen give me, hah? You neva even give me one goat fo make party wit my friends!

30.verse: But dis guy, yoa boy, he wen eat up all da money fo yoa land fo pay da kine wahines dat fool aroun fo money. An wen he come home, right den an dea you kill da bestes young cow fo him, an den!’

31.verse: “But da fadda tell, ‘My boy, you everytime stay hea wit me, an everyting I get, yoas too.

32.verse: But eh! good we make party an dance an sing an feel good inside! Cuz jalike dis guy, yoa brudda, wen mahke, but now he come back alive! Cuz he was lost, but now we find um!’ ”

1.verse: Da Story Bout Da Smart Luna - Jesus wen tell da guys he teaching, “You wen hear da story bout da rich guy dat get one luna, an he wen spend da rich guyʼs money on all kine stuffs?

2.verse: So da rich guy tell da luna fo come, an he say, ‘Eh, wat dis I hear bout you? You betta give me one paper dat tell how you wen spend my money, cuz you no goin be in charge no mo.’

3.verse: “Da luna tink, ‘Wat I goin do now? My boss goin fire me, an I not strong nuff fo dig da ditch, an I shame fo beg.

4.verse: I know wat I goin do, so dat wen I no mo job hea, da peopo goin let me come dea house.’

5.verse: “Den da luna tell all da guys dat owe da rich guy money fo come. He aks da first guy, ‘How plenny money you owe my boss?’

6.verse: Da guy say, ‘One hundred barrel olive oil.’ Da luna say, ‘Dis yoa bill. Hurry up! Sit down an write fifty.’

7.verse: Da luna aks anodda guy, ‘How plenny money you owe?’ He say, ‘One tousand bushel wheat.’ Da luna say, ‘Dis yoa bill. Write eight hundred.’

8.verse: No matta da luna wen do stuff dass not right befo, now da boss talk good to him bout dis smart ting he wen do. You know, da peopo dat stick wit dis world mo smart wit da kine money stuff den da peopo dat stick wit Godʼs light.”

9.verse: “I telling you, no matta can use money fo all kine stuff dass not right, you guys can use um too fo make friends fo yoaself. Den bumbye, wen da time come dat da money an everyting goin pau, God goin tell you guys ‘Aloha!’ inside his place dat stay foeva.

10.verse: Whoeva do da small kine stuff he suppose to, you can trus him fo do da big kine stuff he suppose to. Whoeva no do da right ting fo da small kine stuff, you can trus him fo no do da right ting fo da big kine stuff.

11.verse: So, no matta peopo can get money fo do stuff dass not right, if you not da kine guy peopo can trus wit even dat kine money, no way God goin trus you fo take care all his rich kine stuffs dass fo real.

12.verse: An if nobody can trus you fo take care odda peopoʼs stuffs, no way God goin give you stuff fo yoaself.”

13.verse: “Da worka guy no can work, an two boss guys own him same time. Bumbye he goin hate one boss an love da odda boss. He goin do good kine stuff fo one boss an tink bad bout da odda boss. You no can work fo da God dass fo real an da money god.”

14.verse: But da Pharisee guys, dey love money. Wen dey hear all da stuff Jesus wen say, dey make fun a him.

15.verse: Jesus tell um, “You da guys dat tell da peopo you do da right kine stuff, but God know how you guys stay inside. Da stuff da peopo tink stay real good, dass da stuff God tink no good.”

16.verse: Odda Stuff Jesus Say - “Had da Rules Moses wen write down, an da stuff da guys dat talk fo God wen write down, till John Da Baptiza Guy come. Afta dat us guys tell da Good Stuff bout how peopo can get God fo dea King, an everybody stay jamming, cuz dey like get God fo dea King.

17.verse: Stay mo easy fo da sky an da earth fo go pau den fo one litto line from Godʼs Rules fo go pau.

18.verse: “Whoeva dump his wife an marry anodda wahine, dass jalike he stay fool aroun somebody not his wife. An da guy dat marry one wahine afta her husban wen dump her, dass jalike he stay fool aroun wit anodda guyʼs wife.”

19.verse: Da Rich Guy An Lazarus - Jesus say, “One time had one rich guy dat wear da rich kine clotheses. Everytime he live jalike one king.

20.verse: Had one begga guy name Lazarus dat get sores all ova him. Every day his friends wen put him down by da rich guyʼs gate.

21.verse: You know, he like eat da stuff dat fall down from da rich guyʼs table. An da dogs even wen come lick his sores.

22.verse: “Bumbye da begga guy wen mahke an da angel guys carry him by Abrahamʼs side wit God. An da rich guy mahke too, an dey bury him.

23.verse: Inside da Mahke Peopoʼs Place da rich guy wen suffa plenny, an he look up. He spock Abraham far away wit God, wit Lazarus by his side.

24.verse: “So he yell, ‘Eh Abraham, my ancesta guy! Pity me an send Lazarus fo dip da tip a his finga in water fo cool my tongue, cuz I stay suffa plenny inside dis fire.’

25.verse: “But Abraham say, ‘My boy, rememba dat wen you wen stay alive, you wen get all da good kine stuffs, an Lazarus wen get all da bad kine stuffs. Now he stay good ova hea, an you stay suffa inside dis fire.

26.verse: Anodda ting, in da middle get one real big ditch. You stay on one side, an we stay on da odda. Da peopo dat like go from ova hea to you no can, an da peopo dat like go from ova dea to ova hea no can.’

27.verse: “Da rich guy say, ‘Den I beg you, cuz you my ancesta guy, send Lazarus to my faddaʼs house,

28.verse: cuz I get five bruddas. He gotta tell dem bout dis place, so dat dey no come hea an suffa.’

29.verse: “Abraham say, ‘Yoa bruddas get Moses Rules, an da tings da odda guys dat talk fo God wen write down inside da Bible. Yoa bruddas can hear wat dey say.’

30.verse: “But da rich guy say, ‘No way, Abraham, my ancesta guy! But if one guy come back to dem from mahke, dey goin come sorry fo da bad kine stuff dey wen do, an pau do um.’

31.verse: “But Abraham say, ‘If dey no listen to Moses Rules, an to da guys dat wen talk fo God, dey no goin listen an trus God, even if one guy come back alive from mahke.’ ”

1.verse: Da Bad Kine Stuff - Jesus tell da guys he teaching, “Tings dat make peopo do bad kine stuff goin happen, but auwe fo da guy dat make anodda guy do um!

2.verse: Mo betta take one big stone, tie um aroun da guyʼs neck, den throw him inside da deep ocean fo drown, so he no can make even one a my small kids hea do bad kine stuff.

3.verse: So watch out wat you do! “If yoa brudda do bad kine stuff, scold um, an if he come really sorry an pau do um, den no stay huhu wit him, but let him go.

4.verse: If he do bad ting fo hurt you seven times in one day, an he come back by you seven times, an say, ‘I really sorry, an I pau do dat,’ den no stay huhu wit him, but let him go.”

5.verse: Da Guy Dat Trus God Fo Real Kine - Da guys da Boss Jesus like send all ova tell him, “Help us trus God moa.”

6.verse: Da Boss say, “If you trus God litto bit jalike one small mustard seed, you can tell dis mulberry tree, ‘Pull yoaself up an go plant yoaself in da ocean,’ an da tree goin do um.”

7.verse: Wat One Worka Guy Gotta Do - “Wat you tink? If get one worka guy dat plow da dirt fo his boss, o take care his sheeps, wen da guy come inside from da field, you tink da boss goin tell um, ‘Come on! Eat’? No way!

8.verse: Da boss goin say, ‘Make my suppa, go get ready, an bring um all fo me so I can eat an drink. Afta dat, you goin eat an drink.’ Dass wat he goin say.

9.verse: You tink he goin tank da worka guy cuz he wen do wat da boss tell um fo do? No way!

10.verse: Same ting. Wen you guys go do everyting you suppose to, den you goin say, ‘We jus worka guys. We ony wen do wat we suppose to.’ ”

11.verse: Jesus Make Ten Lepa Guys Come Good - Jesus stay going Jerusalem, an he pass by wea Samaria an Galilee come togedda.

12.verse: He go inside one small town, an ten lepa guys wen come by him. Dey stand far away

13.verse: an yell, “Jesus, Boss, pity us!”

14.verse: Jesus see um an tell um, “Go let da priest guys check you guys out.” An wen dey stay going, dey wen come good.

15.verse: One a da guys see dat he wen come good. He come back, saying good stuff bout God wit one loud voice.

16.verse: He throw himself down by Jesus feet, an tell him “Mahalo plenny!” He one guy from Samaria.

17.verse: Jesus wen tell, “No had ten guys dat wen come good? Wea da odda nine?

18.verse: How come da odda guys no come back an tell how awesome God stay, ony dis one guy dat not Jewish?”

19.verse: Den Jesus tell da guy, “Get up! Go! You wen trus me, dass why you wen come good.”

20.verse: God Da King Goin Come - One time, da Pharisee guys wen aks Jesus wen God da King goin come an take ova. Jesus tell, “Wen God da King take ova, no goin get sign notting fo tell peopo wass goin happen.

21.verse: An da peopo no goin say, ‘Eh! He stay ova hea!’, o ‘Eh! He stay ova dea!’. Cuz God awready stay King inside da peopo.”

22.verse: Den he tell da guys he teaching, “Eh, you know, I Jesus, da Guy Dass Fo Real. Goin get one time, wen you guys goin tink, ‘Eh! Fo real kine, I like see Jesus come back now!’ But you no goin see me.

23.verse: Da peopo goin tell you, ‘Eh! He stay ova hea!’ o ‘Eh! He stay ova dea!’ But no listen, no go wit dem.

24.verse: Cuz I da Guy Dass Fo Real, an wen I come back, goin be real quick, jalike wen da lightning flash an make da sky come light from one side to da odda side.

25.verse: But first I gotta suffa plenny stuff, an da peopo dat stay nowdays no goin take me in.

26.verse: “I da Guy Dass Fo Real, an wen I come back, goin be jalike befo time wen Noah wen stay.

27.verse: Dat time da peopo wen eat an drink, dey wen marry an give dea girls fo marry, till da day Noah wen go inside da big boat. Den da big water wen come an kill um all.

28.verse: Goin be jalike wen Lot wen stay. Everybody stay eating an drinking, buying stuff an selling um, planting seed, an building house.

29.verse: But da day Lot wen go way from Sodom, fire an sulfur wen come down from da sky on top dem an kill um all.

30.verse: Dass how goin be wen I show up, me, da Guy Dass Fo Real.

31.verse: Dat time da guy dat stay resting on top his flat roof house betta not go inside fo get his stuffs. Same ting, da guy inside da field betta not go back fo get someting.

32.verse: Tink bout Lotʼs wife!

33.verse: Whoeva try hang on to his life goin lose um. An whoeva give up his life goin hang on to um.

34.verse: I telling you guys, dat nite wen I come, two peopo goin stay in one bed. God goin take one, an leave da odda.

35.verse: Two wahines goin stay grinding fo make da wheat flour togedda. God goin take one, an leave da odda.”

36.verse: [Two guys goin stay inside one field. God goin take one, an leave da odda.]

37.verse: Den da guys Jesus teaching say, “Wea, Boss?” Jesus tell, “Wen dat happen, you guys goin know wea I stay. Jalike everybody know wea get someting mahke, cuz dass wea da scavenja birds come togedda.”

1.verse: Da Story Bout Da Widow An Da Judge - Jesus wen tell his guys one story fo show dem dat dey gotta pray everytime an no give up.

2.verse: He say, “Inside one town, had one judge dat no scared God an no mo respeck fo da peopo.

3.verse: Had one widow ova dea inside dat town dat stay come by da judge fo beg him, ‘Please, make tings right fo me! Cuz get one guy dat stay ripping me off.’

4.verse: Long time da judge neva like do notting. Den in da end he tink, ‘No matta I no scared God an I no mo respeck fo da peopo,

5.verse: dis widow stay bodda me, so I goin make tings right fo her, so she no come no mo an wear me out!’ ”

6.verse: Den da Boss Jesus wen tell his guys, “Tink bout wat da judge wen say, dat neva like do da right ting.

7.verse: You guys tink God no goin make tings right fo da ones he wen pick, wen dey stay beg him day an nite? You tink he goin take long time fo help dem?

8.verse: I telling you, he goin make tings right fo dem right away. But I da Guy Dass Fo Real, an wen I come back, you tink I goin find peopo dat trus God hea on top da earth, o wat?”

9.verse: Da Story Bout Da Pharisee Guy An Da Tax Guy - Jesus tell one story fo da guys dat stay shua dey good guys an all da odda guys bad.

10.verse: He say, “Two guys wen go to Godʼs Temple fo pray, one Pharisee guy, an one guy dat collect money fo tax fo da govermen.

11.verse: Da Pharisee guy stand up an pray by himself lidis, ‘God, tank you dat I no stay like da odda guys, da guys dat steal, no do da right ting, fool aroun da odda guyʼs wife, an even like dis guy hea dat take money fo tax.

12.verse: Two times every week, I no eat so I can pray, an I give da temple ten percent from all da money I get.’

13.verse: But da guy dat take money fo tax wen stand up far away. He no even like look up to da sky, but he beat on his chest an say, ‘God, I one guy dat wen do bad kine stuff. Give me chance!’ ”

14.verse: Jesus say, “I telling you, wen dis tax guy go home, he get um right wit God awready. But not da Pharisee guy. Cuz whoeva make himself importan goin come not importan, an whoeva make himself not importan goin come importan.”

15.verse: Jesus Pray Fo Da Small Kids - Da peopo wen bring dea small kids by Jesus, cuz dey like fo him put his hands on top dea heads an pray fo dem. Wen Jesus guys see dat, dey wen scold da peopo cuz dey wen do dat.

16.verse: But Jesus tell da kids fo come, an he say, “Let da small kids come by me, an no stop dem, cuz da peopo dat get God fo dea King, inside demself dey jalike dese kids.

17.verse: Dass right! An I like tell you guys dis too: Whoeva no take God fo be his King jalike one small kid, he no can get God fo his King.”

18.verse: Da Rich Guy - One leada guy wen tell him, “Teacha, you good. Wat I gotta do fo get da real kine life dat stay to da max foeva?”

19.verse: Jesus tell him, “How come you say I good? Ony get One dat stay good, dass God.

20.verse: You know Godʼs Rules: ‘No go fool aroun da odda guyʼs wife, no go kill nobody, no rip off nobody, no bulai any kine bout nobody, show respeck fo yoa fadda an mudda.’ ”

21.verse: Da guy wen say, “Ho, Teacha! From small kid time I stay do all dat stuff.”

22.verse: Wen Jesus hear dat, he tell him, “Ony one mo ting you neva do dat you gotta do. Go sell all da stuffs you get, an go give da money to da peopo dat no mo notting. Den garans you goin get plenny good kine stuffs inside da sky. Den come wit me fo be my guy.”

23.verse: Da guy wen hear dat, an he come real sad, cuz he get plenny rich stuffs.

24.verse: Jesus look at him an say, “Az why hard fo one rich guy fo get God fo his King!

25.verse: Stay mo easy fo one camel go thru da puka in one needle, den fo one rich guy fo get God fo his King.”

26.verse: Da peopo dat wen hear him, dey say, “If dass how gotta be, who can get outa da bad kine stuff he stay in, den?”

27.verse: Jesus tell, “No mo nobody dat can do um, but ony God, he da One dat can do um all.”

28.verse: Den Peter tell, “Eh Boss, look! We wen leave everyting we get fo go wit you.”

29.verse: Jesus say, “Az right! An I tell you, Everybody dat leave his home o wife o bruddas o fadda an mudda o kids fo God da King,

30.verse: he goin get plenny mo now in dis time, an bumbye he goin get da real kine life dat stay to da max foeva.”

31.verse: Jesus Say One Mo Time He Goin Mahke - Jesus wen take his twelve guys by da side a da road, an tell um, “Eh, listen, we going Jerusalem. I da Guy Dass Fo Real, an everyting da guys dat wen talk fo God befo time wen say bout me, goin happen.

32.verse: Dey goin turn me ova to da guys dat not Jews. Dey goin make fun a me, an talk any kine to me, an spit on me, an whip me hard, an kill me.

33.verse: But day numba three, I goin come back alive.”

34.verse: Jesus guys, dey neva know wat he say. Jalike someting stay hiding from dem.

35.verse: Jesus Make One Blind Begga Guy Come Good - Jesus come to Jericho town, an one blind guy stay sitting an begging by da side a da road.

36.verse: Da blind guy hear all da peopo pass, an he aks um, “Wass happening?”

37.verse: Dey tell him, “Jesus from Nazaret stay pass.”

38.verse: Den he yell, “Jesus! You King Davidʼs boy! Pity me an give me chance!”

39.verse: Da peopo in front scold him an tell him fo shut up. But he yell mo loud, “Davidʼs boy! Pity me an give me chance!”

40.verse: So Jesus wen stop an tell da peopo fo bring da blind guy by him. Wen he wen come near, Jesus tell him,

41.verse: “Wat you like me do fo you?” He say, “Boss, I like see.”

42.verse: Den Jesus tell him, “See den! You wen trus me, so now, you can see.”

43.verse: Right den an dea da guy wen see, an he wen go wit Jesus, talking bout how awesome God. Wen all da peopo see dat, dey wen tank God an talk good bout him.

1.verse: Jesus An Zaccheus - Jesus wen go inside Jericho an stay go pass right thru da town an neva stop.

2.verse: Ova dea get one boss fo da guys dat collect money fo tax fo da govermen, name Zakeus. He one rich guy.

3.verse: Zakeus like see wat Jesus look like, but he no can see um, cuz he short, an get plenny odda peopo dat like see Jesus too.

4.verse: So he run in front, climb one fig tree fo see um, cuz Jesus goin go by dat place.

5.verse: Wen Jesus go by dea, he look up an tell Zakeus, “Come down now, Zakeus. I gotta stay yoa house today.”

6.verse: So Zakeus come down real fast, an take him inside his house. He stay feel real good inside.

7.verse: All da peopo see dat, an start fo squawk. Dey say, “Jesus wen go inside da house a dat guy dat get bad name!”

8.verse: Zakeus, he stand up an tell da Boss, “Look, Boss! I goin give half a my stuffs to da peopo dat no mo notting, an whoeva I wen rip off, I goin pay um back four times moa den wat I wen get.”

9.verse: Jesus tell um, “Da guy dat own dis house, he from Abrahamʼs ohana. Today God take him outa all da bad kine stuff he doing.

10.verse: Cuz me, da Guy Dass Fo Real, I wen come hea fo look fo da guys dat stay cut off from God, fo take um outa da bad kine stuff dey doing.”

11.verse: Da Story Bout Da Gold Coins - Da peopo hear wat Jesus wen say. Den Jesus tell um anodda story, cuz he stay near Jerusalem, an da peopo tink dat God goin come King right away ova dea.

12.verse: Jesus tell, “Had one ali‛i dat wen go one far place fo come king an den come back.

13.verse: Befo he go, he tell ten worka guys fo come. He give every guy one gold coin. He say, ‘Go use dis coin fo make money till I come back.’

14.verse: But da peopo hate da ali‛i guy, an dey send guys to da odda place fo say, ‘We no like dis guy fo be our king.’

15.verse: But da ali‛i wen come king. Den he come back. He tell his worka guys fo come by him, da guys he wen give da money. He like find out how plenny money dey wen make.

16.verse: Da first guy come an he say, ‘I wen get ten mo gold coins from da one you wen give me.’

17.verse: Da king tell him, ‘You wen do good. You one good worka. Cuz you wen show I can trus you wit da small kine stuff, you goin take charge a ten towns.’

18.verse: Da nex guy come an he say, ‘Boss, I wen get five mo gold coins from da one you wen give me.’

19.verse: Da king tell him, ‘You goin take charge a five towns.’

20.verse: Den anodda worka guy come an he say, ‘Boss, hea yoa gold coin. I wen go hide um inside one cloth.

21.verse: I scared you, cuz you one hard guy. You take wat not yoas, an you cut da crop dat you neva plant.’

22.verse: Da boss tell, ‘Auwe! I goin make like one judge. Wat you wen say show you one bad worka! You know I one hard guy. I take wat not mines, an I cut da crop dat I neva plant.

23.verse: How come you neva put my money inside da bank, so dat wen I come back I can get my money an mo too?’

24.verse: Den he tell da guys dat standing dea, ‘Eh, take away dis guyʼs gold coin from um, an give um to da guy dat get ten coins.’

25.verse: Dey say, ‘Az not fair, Boss! Dat guy get ten coins awready!’

26.verse: Da king say, ‘I telling you, whoeva get stuff, dey goin get mo plenny, but whoeva no mo notting, dey goin lose even da litto bit dey get.

27.verse: Da guys dat stay agains me an no like me fo be dea king -- bring um ova hea, an kill um in front me.’ ”

28.verse: Jesus Go Inside Jerusalem Jalike One King - Jesus say dat, an den he go Jerusalem in front da peopo.

29.verse: Wen he come near Betpage an Betany, by Olive Ridge, he send two a his guys in front, an tell um,

30.verse: “Go by da small town ova dea, an wen you go inside um, you goin find one young donkey stay tie to da fence, dat nobody wen ride um yet. Hemo da rope from da fence an bring um ova hea.

31.verse: If somebody aks you guys, ‘Eh, how come you hemo um from da fence?’ tell him, ‘Da Boss need um.’ ”

32.verse: Da guys go, an find um jalike he wen say.

33.verse: Wen dey hemo da rope from da fence fo da young donkey, da ownas say, “How come you hemo um from da fence?”

34.verse: Dey tell, “Da Boss need um.”

35.verse: Dey bring da young donkey by Jesus, an put dea coats on top da donkey, an put Jesus on top.

36.verse: Jesus ride down da road. Da peopo put down dea coats on top da road jalike fo one king.

37.verse: Wen he come near da place wea da road come down from Olive Ridge, all da peopo wen start fo feel good inside an yell good stuff bout God, cuz a all da awesome stuff dey wen see dat show Jesus power.

38.verse: Dey say, “God goin do plenny good kine stuff fo dis guy! He da King dat come fo da Boss Up Dea! Everyting stay good wit God an da peopo. God in da sky, he awesome!”

39.verse: Den some Pharisee guys from da peopo tell Jesus, “Teacha, scold yoa guys! Not good, wat dey saying!”

40.verse: Jesus say, “I telling you, if dey shut up, even da stones goin yell same ting.”

41.verse: Jesus Cry Bout Da Peopo Inside Jerusalem - Jesus come near Jerusalem an look da town, an he cry.

42.verse: He say, “You guys inside Jerusalem, if ony you guys wen know today wat can make you guys stay good wit God an come his friends -- but now you guys no can undastan.

43.verse: Da time goin come wen da guys dat stay agains you guys goin pile up dirt all aroun yoa town fo make you guys stay inside.

44.verse: Dey goin wipe out you guys, you an yoa kids inside dea. Dey no goin let one stone stay on top da odda. Cuz you guys neva like know wen God show up fo take you guys outa da bad kine stuff you doing.”

45.verse: Jesus Go Inside Da Temple - Den Jesus wen reach Jerusalem. He go inside da temple yard, an start fo throw out da guys dat was selling stuff inside dea.

46.verse: He say, “Da Bible say, ‘My temple goin be one house fo pray inside.’ But you guys stay make um jalike one hangout fo crooks!”

47.verse: From den, every day Jesus teach inside da temple yard. Da main priest guys, da teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules, an da leadas fo da peopo wen like kill um,

48.verse: but dey neva find out how fo do um, cuz all da peopo like hear everyting he say.

1.verse: How Jesus Get Da Right Fo Do Wat He Do - One time Jesus go inside da temple yard, an teach da peopo da Good Stuff From God. Da main priest guys, da teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules, an da older leadas fo da peopo go by him.

2.verse: Dey aks him, “Wat right you get fo do dis kine stuff? Who say you can do um?”

3.verse: Jesus tell um, “I like aks you guys someting too.

4.verse: John Da Baptiza, wen he wen baptize da peopo, wea he get da right fo do dat? God in da sky, he give um da right? O da peopo, dey give um da right?”

5.verse: Da main priest dem start fo squawk wit each odda bout dat, an tell, “If we say, ‘Was God in da sky wen give John da right,’ den Jesus goin say, ‘How come you guys neva believe wat John wen say, den?’

6.verse: But if we say, ‘Da peopo give um da right,’ den all da peopo goin throw stones fo kill us, cuz dey tink fo shua dat John wen talk fo God.”

7.verse: So da main priest dem tell, “We donno wea John wen get da right fo baptize.”

8.verse: Jesus tell um, “Kay den, I no goin tell you guys from wea I get da right fo do dis kine stuff.”

9.verse: Da Guys Dat Work Inside Da Grape Farm - Jesus tell da peopo anodda story fo teach um. He say, “One guy wen plant grapes inside one grape farm, an he rent um to some farma guys. Den he go way long time.

10.verse: Wen da time come fo cut da grapes, he send one worka guy by da guys dat rent his farm, so dey can give him some grapes. But da guys dat rent da farm bus up da worka guy an send um away wit notting.

11.verse: He send anodda worka guy, an dey bus him up too, an dey no shame fo make any kine to him, an send um away wit notting.

12.verse: Den he send one nodda guy. Dey bus him up an make um bleed, an throw um outside.

13.verse: Den da boss fo da grape farm say, ‘Wat I goin do? Eh, I know wat! I goin send my ony boy, da one I love. Fo shua, dey goin show respeck fo him!’

14.verse: But wen da guys dat rent da farm spock him, dey tell each odda, ‘Eh, dis da ownaʼs boy. He da guy goin own da farm bumbye. Come, we go kill him. Den everyting he get goin come ours!’

15.verse: So dey throw him outside da grape farm an kill him.” Den Jesus say, “Wat you guys tink da guy dat own da grape farm goin do to da guys dat rent da farm?

16.verse: He goin come wipe um out, an rent da grape farm to odda guys.” Wen da peopo hear dat, dey say, “Nah! Da owna no goin wipe um out!”

17.verse: Jesus look dem in da eye an say, “Den wat dat mean inside da Bible dat say, ‘Had one big stone, Da builda guys neva like use um, An dey no take um. But dat stone, Dass da corner block Dat make da building strong.’

18.verse: Anybody dat trip an fall down on top dat stone, dat stone goin broke dem. If dat stone fall down on top somebody, dat stone goin make um jalike dust. An dat stone, dass me, you know.”

19.verse: Pay Da Tax - Da teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules an da main priest guys wen like bus Jesus right den an dea, cuz dey know dat he tell dat story fo teach bout dem. But dey scared da peopo.

20.verse: So dey look fo da right time fo do um. Dey send some guys fo watch him. Dem guys wen ack like dey good guys. Dey like trick Jesus wit wat he say, so dey can turn him ova to da leada guys an to da governa who get power.

21.verse: So da guys dat stay watching him tell him, “Eh, Teacha, we know dat you talk strait an wat you say an teach stay true. You do da same to everybody, an you teach Godʼs way fo real kine.

22.verse: So, wat? We still gotta pay tax to Cesar, da king fo da Rome peopo, o wat?”

23.verse: But Jesus know dey smart an trying fo trick him, so he tell um,

24.verse: “Show me one coin. Who dis guy on top da coin? An wass his name?”

25.verse: Dey say, “Dass King Cesar.” Jesus say, “Kay den, give um to Cesar wat his, an give to God wat his!”

26.verse: Dey no can trick him wit wat he say in front da peopo. Wat he say blow dea minds, an dey no say notting.

27.verse: We Goin Come Back Alive - Now, da Sadducee guys, dey say nobody can come back alive afta he mahke. Some a dem Sadducee guys wen come by Jesus an aks him,

28.verse: “Eh, Teacha, Moses wen write fo us inside da Bible, dat if one guyʼs brudda mahke an his wife stay, but no mo kids, da mahke guyʼs brudda gotta marry da widow an get kids fo his brudda.

29.verse: Now, had seven bruddas. Da first brudda wen marry one wahine an den mahke, an no mo kids.

30.verse: Da numba two brudda marry her, an mahke, an no mo kids.

31.verse: An da numba three brudda same ting, an da oddas too, an no mo kids.

32.verse: Den afta dat, da wahine mahke too.

33.verse: So, dey all wen marry her. Bumbye, wen da time come wen all da peopo dat wen mahke goin come back alive, dat time, who goin be her husban?”

34.verse: Jesus tell um, “Da peopo in dis time marry an give dea girls fo marry.

35.verse: But God say some peopo get um right wit him. Dey da ones, he goin make um come back alive inside da nex world, an give um da kine life dat stay to da max foeva. Dat time dem guys no goin marry o give dea girls fo marry.

36.verse: Dat time dey no can mahke, but dey goin stay jalike da angel guys. Cuz dey Godʼs kids, an dey goin come back alive.

37.verse: Now, long time ago, wen Moses wen spock one bush dat stay burning, he wen talk to God ova dea. Moses wen use dis name fo da Boss Up Dea Inside Da Sky -- he call um ‘Da God fo Abraham, Isaac, an Jacob.’ So Moses wen show dat da mahke peopo goin come back alive.

38.verse: Cuz God not da God fo da mahke peopo, but fo da peopo dat stay alive. Cuz everybody dat stay tight wit God, dey alive!”

39.verse: Some teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules wen say, “Dass good wat you say, Teacha!”

40.verse: An nobody aks him mo stuff.

41.verse: Da Spesho Guy God Send - Jesus aks da teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules, “How come dey say dat da Spesho Guy God Send, he King Davidʼs boy?

42.verse: David, he tell inside da Songs fo God, ‘Da Boss Up Dea Inside Da Sky, He tell my Boss, “Come ova hea, sit down! Dis da importan place by my right side.

43.verse: Bumbye I goin make da peopo dat go agains you Go down in front you, Fo show dat you da winna ova dem.” ’

44.verse: Kay den, King David call him ‘My Boss,’ yeah? Den how come he can be Davidʼs boy, same time?”

45.verse: Jesus Tell Um Bout Da Teachas Dat Teach Godʼs Rules - Da peopo stay listen to Jesus, an he tell his guys,

46.verse: “Watch out fo da teacha guys dat teach Godʼs Rules. Dey like go aroun an wear fancy kine religious kine clotheses. Dey like da peopo fo talk to dem wit respeck inside da market. Dey like sit in da main place inside da Jewish churches, an da main place at da lu‛aus.

47.verse: But dey no shame fo rip off da widows an take away dea houses. Same time dey make big show an pray long time, ony fo make peopo tink dey do good kine stuff fo dem. Dese kine peopo, dey goin get it mo worse from God da Judge wen da time come!”

1.verse: Wat One Widow Wen Give God - Jesus wen look up an spock da rich guys putting dea money inside da money box inside da temple.

2.verse: Den he spock one widow dat no mo notting. She put two small copper coins inside dea.

3.verse: He say, “I tell you guys da trut: Dis widow dat no mo notting, she wen put in mo plenny money den all da odda peopo.

4.verse: All da odda peopo wen give dea money from plenny money dey get. But her no mo notting, an she wen give God da ony money she get fo stay alive.”

5.verse: Jesus Talk Bout How Dey Goin Bus Up Da Temple - Some a his guys wen talk story bout da temple, how da temple get da awesome stones an da odda tings da peopo wen give fo God. Jesus say,

6.verse: “You guys see all dis stuff? Bumbye no goin get one stone on top da odda. Peopo goin throw um all down.”

7.verse: Jesus guys wen aks him, “Teacha, wat time all dat kine stuff goin happen? An wat kine ting goin happen fo show us wen da time come fo dat?”

8.verse: Jesus tell um, “Watch out! No let nobody fool you guys! Plenny guys goin show up an use my name. Dey goin say, ‘Eh me, I dat Spesho Christ Guy from God! Da time stay now!’ But no go wit dem.

9.verse: You guys goin hear, ‘Dey fighting an get war all ova da place.’ No bum out. All dat kine stuff gotta happen, but dat no mean everyting goin pau yet.”

10.verse: He say, “Countries goin fight each odda. Kings goin fight each odda.

11.verse: Da groun goin shake. No goin get food, an all ova da place da peopo no goin get notting fo eat. Plenny peopo goin get real sick an mahke. Real bad an awesome stuff goin come dat goin scare plenny peopo. Unreal stuff from da sky goin come.

12.verse: “Befo all dat stuff come, peopo goin bus you guys an make you guys suffa. Dey goin turn you guys ova to da Jewish churches an throw you guys inside jail. Dey goin take you guys in front kings an governas. Dey goin do all dat cuz you my guys.

13.verse: Den you guys goin get chance fo tell dem da Good Stuff From God.

14.verse: “But befo dat happen, tink lidis: You guys no need worry wat you goin say.

15.verse: Cuz I goin give you guys wat fo say, an I goin make you guys akamai, so da guys dat stand up agains you no goin know wat fo say, an dey no goin show proof dat you guys wen do wrong.

16.verse: “Even yoa fadda an mudda goin set you guys up. Yoa bruddas, yoa ohana, an yoa friends goin set you guys up too, an dey even goin kill some a you guys.

17.verse: Everybody goin hate you guys cuz dey know you my guys.

18.verse: But dey no goin hurt you guys. You guys no goin lose even one hair from yoa head!

19.verse: If you guys hang in dea to da end, you guys goin get da kine life dass fo real!”

20.verse: Peopo Goin Bus Up Jerusalem - “Wen you guys see Jerusalem town wit da armies all aroun dea, you goin know dat da time stay near wen dey goin bus up Jerusalem.

21.verse: Den da peopo dat stay Judea side gotta run to da mountains. Da guys inside Jerusalem town gotta get out, an da guys inside da boonies betta not go back to da town.

22.verse: Cuz da time stay dat dey gotta suffa plenny, jalike da Bible say.

23.verse: Goin be hard time fo da hapai wahines an da muddas dat stay nursing dea babies! Everybody in da land goin suffa plenny, cuz God no take da bad kine stuff da peopo wen do.

24.verse: Peopo goin kill some wit swords, an take oddas away. Peopo all ova da world goin make um prisonas. Da peopos dat not Jews goin bus up Jerusalem an walk all ova um, till dea time pau.”

25.verse: Da Guy Dass Fo Real Goin Come - “Goin get awesome stuff fo see up inside da sky, wit da sun, da moon, an da stars. All ova da world, da peopos from inside da diffren countries goin suffa plenny. Dey goin come all bum out, jalike peopo feel wen da ocean pound loud an da waves come wild.

26.verse: Da peopo goin pass out cuz dey so scared. Dey scared cuz dey donno wat goin happen inside da world. Da big powers inside da sky like da stars goin get shake up.

27.verse: Dat time dey goin spock me, da Guy Dass Fo Real, coming inside one cloud wit big power, an I goin be real awesome.

28.verse: Wen all dat stuff start fo happen, stand up tall an look up, cuz da time stay near fo God cut you guys loose from da power da bad kine stuff get ova you.”

29.verse: Da Story Bout Da Fig Tree - Jesus tell um anodda story fo teach um. He say, “Look da fig tree an every kine tree.

30.verse: Wen get new leaf, you can see um, an you know da summa time almos come.

31.verse: Same ting. Wen you guys see all dis stuff happen, den you goin know dat God stay King hea now.

32.verse: “Dass right! An I tell you guys dis too: All dat stuff goin happen befo all da guys dat stay alive nowdays goin mahke.

33.verse: Da sky an da earth goin pau, but wat I say no goin pau foeva.”

34.verse: Watch Out! - “Watch out! No good you guys come all jam up wit too much partying, getting drunk, an worry bout all kine stuff. No good da Boss come back, an you guys not ready.

35.verse: Quick like one trap dat day goin come fo all da peopo dat stay inside da whole world.

36.verse: Watch out everytime, an stay ready. Aks God fo let you get outa all da stuff dat goin happen, an fo let you stand in front me, da Guy Dass Fo Real.”

37.verse: Every day Jesus wen teach inside da temple yard. Wen da sun go down, he wen go outside da town fo stay on top Olive Ridge.

38.verse: An real early in da morning da peopo come fo hear him teach inside da temple yard.

1.verse: Dey Goin Set Jesus Up - Da time wen come fo da Passova, an da spesho religious time dey call Da Bread Dat No Mo Yeast time.

2.verse: Da main priest guys an da teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules wen tink plenny how dey can kill Jesus. But dey scared da peopo.

3.verse: Judas Goin Sell Out Jesus - Den da Devil wen take ova Judas Iscariot, one a Jesus twelve guys.

4.verse: So Judas wen go talk to da main priest guys, an da officers fo da temple, fo see how he goin set Jesus up.

5.verse: Da main priest dem wen feel real good inside, an dey say dey goin give Judas money fo do um.

6.verse: Judas like da deal, so he look fo one chance fo set Jesus up fo dem so nobody know.

7.verse: Jesus Goin Eat Da Passova Food - Da day fo da Bread Dat No Mo Yeast come, wen dey kill da baby sheep fo da Passova sacrifice.

8.verse: Jesus send Peter an John. He say, “Go make ready da Passova food fo us eat.”

9.verse: Dey say, “Wea you like us make um ready?”

10.verse: Jesus say, “You know, wen you guys go inside town, one guy goin come dat carry one water jug. Go wit him inside one house,

11.verse: an tell da guy dat own da house, ‘Da Teacha say, “Wea da room me an my guys goin eat da Passova food?” ’

12.verse: He goin show you guys one big room upstairs, dat get everyting. Make da food ready dea.”

13.verse: Da guys wen go an dey wen find everyting jalike Jesus wen say. An dey make da Passova food.

14.verse: Da Dinna Wit Da Boss - Wen da time come, Jesus wen sit down at da table wit da guys he goin send all ova bumbye.

15.verse: He tell um, “I tinking plenny bout dis. I really like eat dis Passova food wit you guys befo I suffa.

16.verse: Fo shua, afta dat, I no goin eat um again till God da King come an take ova.”

17.verse: Den Jesus take da cup, an tell God “Mahalo” an say, “Take dis an pass um down to da oddas.

18.verse: Fo shua, I no goin drink notting from da grape plant again till da day God da King come an take ova.”

19.verse: Den he take da bread, an tell God “Mahalo,” an broke um, an give um to dem. He say, “Dis hea, my body dat I give up fo you guys. From now, tink bout me everytime you eat dis.”

20.verse: Same ting, afta da food he take da cup an say, “Dis cup, da new deal I goin make wit my blood dat I goin pour out fo you guys wen I mahke.

21.verse: But you know, da guy dat goin set me up stay hea wit me at da table.

22.verse: I da Guy Dass Fo Real, an I goin mahke jalike God wen say, but auwe da guy dat goin set me up!”

23.verse: An da guys aks each odda, “Who da guy goin do dat?”

24.verse: Da Guys Talk Bout Who Da Main Guy - Da guys stay talking wit each odda. Dey say, “Wat one a us guys you tink goin be da main guy?”

25.verse: Jesus say, “Da kings fo da diffren peopos, dey boss aroun dea peopo. Dey da guys dat run da peopo, an everybody say da kings good guys cuz dey stay helping dea peopo.

26.verse: But you guys, no be lidat. Wit you guys, da main guy gotta be jalike one small kid, an da boss gotta be da one dat work fo all da oddas.

27.verse: Who you guys tink da main guy? Da guy dat stay sit by da table o da guy dat bring him da food? You tink da guy dat sit by da table? But me, I not lidat. You know, I stay wit you guys, but I work fo you guys.

28.verse: You da guys dat wen stick wit me wen I suffa plenny.

29.verse: I goin make you guys come kings jalike my Fadda wen make me one king.

30.verse: You guys goin eat an drink by my table wen I come King, an you guys goin sit down on top thrones, an come judges fo da twelve Israel ohanas.”

31.verse: Peter Goin Say He Donno Jesus - Den Jesus tell Peter, “Eh, Peter, listen! Da Devil wen aks God if he can give all you guys one big test. Jalike one farma guy take da junk outa da wheat, da Devil like find out who fo real an who not.

32.verse: But I wen aks God fo help you, Peter, so you trus God an no give up. Afta you come sorry an come back by me, kokua yoa bruddas.”

33.verse: But Peter say, “Boss, I stay ready fo go jail an mahke wit you.”

34.verse: Jesus say, “I tell you, Peter, befo da roosta make noise early today, three times you goin say dat you donno who me.”

35.verse: Da Money Bag, Da Clothes Bag, An Da Sword - Den Jesus tell dem, “Wen I wen send you guys out befo, an you no mo money bag, o bag fo yoa clotheses, o slippas, you wen need anyting moa?” Dey say, “No.”

36.verse: Jesus say, “But now, whoeva get one money bag o one bag fo clotheses, take um. An da guy dat no mo sword, good he sell his coat fo buy one sword.

37.verse: Cuz I telling you, da place inside da Bible dat say, ‘Dey wen put him wit da crooks,’ dass da way gotta happen to me. Wat da Bible wen say bout me befo time, everyting stay happen jus lidat.”

38.verse: Dey say, “Boss, get two swords ova hea awready.” He tell um, “Dass nuff.”

39.verse: Olive Ridge - Jesus go Olive Ridge, jalike he everytime do. His guys go too.

40.verse: Wen dey come dea, he tell um, “Aks God fo help you guys so you no do bad kine stuff wen get chance.”

41.verse: Den he go litto bit mo down by himself, go down on his knees, an aks God fo help him

42.verse: like dis: “Fadda, if you like, no let me suffa lidis. But gotta be da way you like, not da way I like.”

43.verse: [One angel guy from da Boss Up Dea Inside Da Sky show up by Jesus an kokua him.

44.verse: Jesus suffa plenny, an pray mo hard. He sweat jalike big drops blood dat falling down on top da groun.]

45.verse: Wen Jesus pau pray, he stand up an go back by his guys, an find dem all sleeping. Dey worn out, cuz dey sad.

46.verse: He tell dem, “How come you guys sleeping? Get up an aks God fo help you guys no do bad kine stuff wen get chance.”

47.verse: Dey Bus Jesus - Wen Jesus still talking, plenny peopo come ova dea. Judas, one a Jesus twelve guys, he wen bring dem. He come by Jesus fo kiss him.

48.verse: But Jesus tell him, “Judas, I da Guy Dass Fo Real. Wot! You goin set me up wit one kiss?!”

49.verse: Wen Jesus guys figga wat goin happen, dey say, “Boss, you like us hit dem wit our swords?”

50.verse: Den one a dem wen go afta da guy dat work fo da Head Priest, an cut his right ear off.

51.verse: But Jesus say, “No do dat no moa!” An he wen touch da guyʼs ear an make him come good.

52.verse: Den Jesus tell da main priest guys, da captains fo da temple guards, an da older leadas dat come ova dea fo take him, “You guys tink I one crook o wat? Why you guys tink you gotta come ova hea wit swords an clubs fo bus me?

53.verse: Every day I wen stay inside da temple yard wit you guys, an you guys neva bus me. But dis yoa time. Dis da dark time, wen da Bad Guy, da Devil, get power fo do his stuff.”

54.verse: Peter Say He Donno Jesus - Afta dey bus Jesus, dey take him away inside da Head Priest guyʼs house. Peter go too, but he stay far.

55.verse: Dey make one fire inside da yard, an sit down by um togedda. Peter sit down wit dem.

56.verse: One worka girl spock Peter sitting dea by da fire. She look strait at him, an tell da odda guys, “Dis guy was wit Jesus!”

57.verse: But Peter say, “No way, girl! I donno da guy!”

58.verse: Bumbye one guy spock Peter an he say, “You one a dem too!” But Peter say, “No way, brah!”

59.verse: Bout one hour lata anodda guy say, “Fo shua dis guy stay wit Jesus, cuz he come from Galilee.”

60.verse: But Peter wen say, “Eh, brah, I donno wat you talking bout!” Peter still talking, an da roosta wen make noise.

61.verse: Da Boss Jesus wen turn an look at Peter. Den Peter rememba wat da Boss wen tell him, “Befo da roosta make noise tonite, you goin say three times you donno me.”

62.verse: Den Peter go outside an bus out crying.

63.verse: Dey Make Fun A Jesus An Bus Um Up - Da guards make fun a Jesus an bus um up.

64.verse: Dey cover his eyes wit one rag, an give um plenny false crack, an tell him, “Eh, you one talka fo God, yeah? So, tell us who wen hit you!”

65.verse: An dey talk any kine to him.

66.verse: Jesus In Front Da Main Leada Guys - Wen da sun come up, da older leadas fo da peopo, da main priest guys, an da teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules come togedda, an bring Jesus in front dem.

67.verse: Dey say, “If you da Spesho Guy God Wen Send fo real kine, tell us.” Jesus tell dem, “If I tell you guys, you no goin believe me.

68.verse: An if I aks you guys one question you no goin tell me.

69.verse: I da Guy Dass Fo Real. Afta dis I goin sit down da importan place by Godʼs right side. He da One dat get all da power.”

70.verse: Dey all aks, “So you Godʼs Boy?” He tell dem, “Dass right, wat you guys say.”

71.verse: Den dey say, “No need mo guys fo talk agains him! We jus wen hear wat he say!”

1.verse: Jesus In Front Pilate, Da Governa - Den all da peopo dat wen come togedda take Jesus away fo go in front Pilate, da governa.

2.verse: Dey poin finga Jesus, an say, “Dis guy stay bulai our peopo! He teaching dem bad kine stuff! He say dey no need pay King Cesar his tax. He say dat he da Christ guy, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, an dat he one king.”

3.verse: Pilate aks Jesus, “Eh, you da King fo da Jews, o wat?” Jesus say, “Dass right, wat you wen say.”

4.verse: Den Pilate tell da main priest guys an all da peopo, “I no find notting wrong wit dis guy.”

5.verse: But dey say mo strong, “All ova Judea da peopo like beef cuz a da stuff he teaching. He wen start Galilee side. Now, he stay come all da way ova hea.”

6.verse: Jesus In Front King Herod - Pilate hear dat, an he aks Jesus, “You come from Galilee?”

7.verse: Wen Pilate find out dat Jesus come from Galilee, he tell his guys fo take Jesus by Herod. Cuz Herod da one dat stay in charge inside Galilee, an he stay Jerusalem town dat time.

8.verse: Herod, he feel good inside wen he spock Jesus, cuz Herod wen hear bout him an like see him from long time. Herod tink maybe Jesus goin do someting awesome so he can see um.

9.verse: Herod aks Jesus plenny stuff, but Jesus neva say notting.

10.verse: Da main priest guys an da teachas dat teach Godʼs Rules stay dea. Dey poin finga at Jesus real hard.

11.verse: Den Herod an his army guys make fun a Jesus, an show dat dey hate him. Dey put one fancy robe on top him, an send him back to Pilate.

12.verse: Dass how Herod an Pilate wen come friends. Befo dat time dey stay agains each odda.

13.verse: Dey Say Jesus Gotta Mahke - Den Pilate tell da main priest guys, da leada guys, an da peopo fo come.

14.verse: He tell um, “You guys wen bring dis guy by me, an you say he trying fo make da peopo beef agains us Rome guys. I wen aks him plenny stuff in front you, an I no find notting wrong like you guys say, fo poin finga him.

15.verse: An Herod, he neva find notting fo poin finga him too. He wen send him back. You guys know he neva do notting dat say he gotta mahke.

16.verse: So, I goin tell my army guys fo go whip um an let um go.”

17.verse: [Now, every year, da Passova spesho religious time, Pilate gotta let one prisona guy go fo da peopo.]

18.verse: All da peopo was yelling, “Kill Jesus! Let Barabbas go fo us!”

19.verse: You know, da Rome army guys wen throw Barabbas inside jail befo, cuz he lead some a da peopo an dey try fo throw out da leada guys inside Jerusalem. Barabbas even wen kill one guy.

20.verse: Pilate like let Jesus go, so he aks da peopo one mo time.

21.verse: But dey yelling, “Kill Jesus on top one cross! Kill um on top one cross!”

22.verse: One mo time he tell dem, “How come? Wat kine crime dis guy wen do? I no find notting dat say he gotta mahke. So I goin tell my army guys fo whip him an let him go.”

23.verse: But dey stay yelling da top a dea lungs, fo presha Pilate an make um kill Jesus on top one cross, an dey win.

24.verse: So Pilate say dat Jesus gotta mahke, jalike da peopo say.

25.verse: He let Barabbas go, da guy dey pick, dat wen make da peopo beef an wen kill one guy. An he give Jesus to dem so dey can do wat dey like to him.

26.verse: Dey Kill Jesus On Top One Cross - Den dey take Jesus away. One guy name Simon from Cyrene stay coming from da countryside. Da army guys wen grab him, put da cross on top him, an make him carry um behind Jesus.

27.verse: Plenny peopo walking behind Jesus, an some wahines crying. Dey real sad inside cuz a wat happening.

28.verse: Jesus turn an tell um, “Sistas from Jerusalem, no cry fo me. Cry fo yoaself an fo yoa kids.

29.verse: Cuz da time goin come wen you goin say, ‘Lucky now, da wahines dat no mo kids, da wahines dat neva born kids, an da wahines dat neva nurse kids!’

30.verse: Dat time da peopo goin tell da mountains, ‘Fall down on top us!’ An dey goin tell da hills, ‘Hide us!’

31.verse: Cuz if dey doing dis kine stuff to one good guy like me, wat goin happen to da peopo dat not good?”

32.verse: Dey take two crook guys wit him. Dey goin kill dem wit Jesus.
