33.verse: Dey come to da place name “Da Skull.” Dey hang Jesus on top da cross fo kill him dea. Dey hang da two crook guys on top da odda two crosses, one on da right side an da odda on da left side.

34.verse: Jesus say, “Fadda, let um go fo dis bad ting dey doing. Dey donno wat dey doing!” Da army guys throw dice fo take Jesus clotheses.

35.verse: Da peopo stand dea an watch um. Da leada guys fo da Jews make fun a him. Dey say, “Eh, he wen take da odda guys outa da bad kine stuff dey stay in. If he da Spesho Guy God Wen Send fo real kine, how come he no can get himself outa dis now?!”

36.verse: Da army guys make fun a him too. Dey come by him an like give him da cheap kine wine fo drink.

37.verse: Dey say, “Eh, if you da King fo da Jews, get yoaself outa dis, den!”

38.verse: Den dey write, “DIS DA KING FO DA JEWS,” an put um on top da cross.

39.verse: One crook guy dat hanging dea talk any kine to him. He say, “Eh, you da Spesho Guy God Wen Send, o wat? Den get yoaself outa dis, an us guys too!”

40.verse: But da odda crook guy scold him, an say, “Eh, you no scared God, o wat? Dey wen say you gotta mahke, too, jalike him.

41.verse: Us guys get da pay fo wat we wen do, but dis guy, he neva do notting wrong.”

42.verse: An he tell Jesus, “Jesus, rememba me wen you come King!”

43.verse: Jesus tell him, “Eh, you get um! An I tell you dis: Today you goin be wit me inside Godʼs Beautiful Place.”

44.verse: Jesus Mahke - Now was bout noon time, an come real dark all ova da place, till three clock,

45.verse: cuz da sun pau shine. Da big curtain inside da temple wen broke in two.

46.verse: Jesus wen yell real loud. He say, “Fadda, I give you my spirit.” Wen he say dat, he mahke.

47.verse: Da captain fo da army guys see wat happen, an he say good stuff bout God. He say, “Fo shua, dis guy neva do notting wrong! How come dey wen kill him?”

48.verse: Da peopo dat wen come dea fo see wat goin happen see dat, an dey pound dea chests, fo show dat dey know someting real bad wen happen. Den dey go home.

49.verse: All da guys dat wen know Jesus, an da wahines dat wen come dea wit him all da way from Galilee side, dey standing far away, watching all da stuff dat stay happening.

50.verse: Dey Bury Jesus - Had one guy name Joseph. He one a da Jewish National Council guys. He good an everytime do da right ting.

51.verse: He come from Arimatea, Judea side. Wen da odda guys wen like kill Jesus, Joseph neva vote wit dem. He trus God, an stay waiting fo him fo come King.

52.verse: He go in front Pilate, an aks him fo Jesus body.

53.verse: He take Jesus down from da cross, wrap him up inside one linen cloth, an put him inside one cave somebody wen cut inside da rock fo bury somebody, but neva get one mahke guy inside yet.

54.verse: Dat day was da Day Fo Make Ready Fo Da Passova, an da Rest Day almos come.

55.verse: Da wahines dat stick wit Jesus from Galilee side, dey go wit Joseph, an see da cave, an how dey put Jesus mahke body inside.

56.verse: Den dey go home fo make da spices an da perfume ready fo his body. On da Rest Day dey rest, jalike da Bible say fo do.

1.verse: Jesus Come Back Alive - Sunday, da first day in da week, befo da sun come up, da wahines bring da spices dey wen make ready, an go by da cave.

2.verse: Dey see da big stone Jesus friends wen use fo close da cave. But stay on da side now.

3.verse: Dey go inside da cave, but da Boss Jesus, his body no stay dea.

4.verse: Dey no can figga dat. Right den an dea two guys stand dea by dem. Da guys clotheses stay shining.

5.verse: Da wahines stay real scared. Dey go down on dea knees, an ony look da groun. Da two guys tell um, “How come you wahines stay looking fo da guy dat stay alive, ova hea aroun da mahke guys?

6.verse: Jesus not hea; he wen come back alive! Rememba, he wen tell you guys dis wen he still stay wit you guys Galilee side.

7.verse: He wen say, ‘I Da Guy Dass Fo Real. Dey gotta turn me ova to da bad guys. An dey goin kill me on top one cross. But day numba three, I goin come back alive!’ ”

8.verse: Den da wahines rememba wat Jesus wen say.

9.verse: So dey wen come back from da cave, an dey tell all dat stuff to Jesus eleven guys an to da odda peopo.

10.verse: Mary da Magdala wahine, Joanna, James mudda Mary, an da odda wahines dat wen go wit dem, dey tell all dis stuff to da guys dat Jesus was goin send all ova da place.

11.verse: But dem guys, dey neva believe wat da wahines say, cuz sound like dey wen make um up.

12.verse: But Peter wen get up an run to da cave. He bend down, an see ony da grave cloths dea. Den he go way, an he no can figga bout wat wen happen.

13.verse: Two Guys Go Emmaus Town - Dat same day had two a Jesus guys wen go one small town name Emmaus, bout seven miles from Jerusalem.

14.verse: Dey stay talk bout all da stuff dat wen happen.

15.verse: So dey talking lidat, an you know wat? Jesus come, an walk wit dem.

16.verse: But he neva let um know who him.

17.verse: He aks um, “Wat you guys stay talking bout now wen you walking?” Dey stand dea, an dey hang dea face.

18.verse: One a dem, name Cleopas, tell him, “You must be da ony guy inside Jerusalem dat donno all da stuff dat jus wen happen ova dea.”

19.verse: He say, “Wat stuff?” Dey say, “Da stuff dat dey wen do to Jesus, da guy from Nazaret. He one guy dat talk fo God. Wat he wen say an do in front God an all da peopo wen show he get power.

20.verse: Da main priest guys an our leada guys wen turn him in fo mahke. Den dey wen kill him on top one cross.

21.verse: We wen tink he da guy dat goin cut loose da Israel peopo from da power da bad kine stuff get ova dem. Dis wen happen day befo yesterday.

22.verse: Some wahines dat stay wit us wen blow our minds, cuz dey wen go by da cave dis morning, befo da sun come up.

23.verse: But dey neva find his body inside dea. Dey wen tell us dat dey wen see someting from God -- had angel guys dea, dat wen say Jesus stay alive!

24.verse: Some a our guys wen go to da tomb. Everyting stay jalike da wahines say. But dey neva see Jesus body.”

25.verse: Den Jesus tell da two guys, “You guys no tink! You hard head, cuz you guys no trus all da stuff da guys dat wen talk fo God wen say!

26.verse: Dey say dat da Spesho Guy God Goin Send gotta suffa all dis kine stuff, an afta, he goin come real awesome, yeah?”

27.verse: An den Jesus teach dem everyting da Bible wen say bout him from befo time. He start wit da stuff Moses wen write down inside da Rules, an den all da odda guys dat wen talk fo God, wat dey wen write down.

28.verse: Den dey come near Emmaus, da small town, an Jesus ack like he going litto bit mo far.

29.verse: But dey tell him, “Stay hea wit us, cuz pau hana, an dark awready.” So he go inside da house, fo stay wit dem.

30.verse: He sit down by da table fo eat wit dem. He take da bread, an tell God he good heart fo give um da bread, an broke da bread. Den he wen give um to dem.

31.verse: Den jalike dea eyes wen come open, an den dey wen know who he was. But right den an dea he wen disappear.

32.verse: Den dey tell each odda, “Ho! Our hearts was beating fast, all da time he stay talking wit us on top da road, an wen he showing us da stuff from da Bible from befo time, yeah?”

33.verse: Right den an dea dey wen stand up, an dey wen go back Jerusalem. Dey find Jesus eleven guys an da odda guys all togedda.

34.verse: Da eleven guys say, “Da Boss Jesus wen come back alive, fo shua! Simon wen see him!”

35.verse: Den da two guys tell um wat wen happen by da road, an dat dey wen know him wen he broke da bread.

36.verse: Jesus Show Up Wit Da Guys He Wen Teach - Wen dey telling Jesus guys dis, ho! Jesus stand dea wit dem! He say, “No scared. I like you guys stay good inside.”

37.verse: But dey real, real scared! Dey tink dey seeing one ghost!

38.verse: He tell um, “How come you guys all scared? Why you no trus me?

39.verse: Look my hands an my feet. Try touch me, an see dat dis me, fo shua! One ghost no mo bones an skin, like you guys see I get.”

40.verse: He show dem his hands an feet.

41.verse: Dey still no believe, cuz dey all mix up inside. Dey feel real good inside, but same time, dey stay all max out. He tell um, “You guys get someting fo eat?”

42.verse: Dey give him one cook fish.

43.verse: He take um an eat um in front dem.

44.verse: He tell um, “All dis happen jalike I wen tell you guys wen I stay wit you. Everyting Moses wen write inside da Rules, an everyting da odda guys dat wen talk fo God wen write down, an everyting dat get inside da Songs fo God -- all da stuff dat stay from befo time inside da Bible, all dat, talk bout me! An everyting dey wen write, goin happen!”

45.verse: Den he wen help dem undastan da Bible.

46.verse: He tell um, “Dis wat dey wen write, ‘Da Christ guy, da Spesho Guy God Goin Send, he goin suffa an mahke, an den come back alive on day numba three afta he mahke.

47.verse: Afta dat, his guys goin teach all da diffren peopos inside da whole world bout Christ guy, da Spesho Guy God Wen Send. Dey goin tell da peopos dey gotta come sorry fo all da bad kine stuff dey doing, an pau do um. So den, God goin let go da peopos an hemo dea shame fo all da bad kine stuff dey wen do. His guys goin go teach lidat cuz dey his guys an dey get his power, an dey goin start Jerusalem side.’

48.verse: You guys wen see all dis stuff dat wen happen, an you goin tell da peopo bout um.

49.verse: I goin send you guys wat my Fadda wen promise you. So stay hea inside Jerusalem till you guys get da power dat come from God in da sky.”

50.verse: Jesus Go Up Inside Da Sky - Den Jesus take his guys outside Jerusalem, Betany side. He hold up his hands an aks God fo do good tings fo dem.

51.verse: Same time wen Jesus stay aksing God fo do good tings fo dem, he start fo go up inside da sky.

52.verse: Den dey all go down on dea knees fo show Jesus love an respeck. Den dey go back to Jerusalem. An dey stay real good inside.

53.verse: Dey stay inside da temple yard, praying an telling God how good he stay.
